Warranty Service Type : NA Installation & Demo Details : We'll facilitate the installation and demo through authorized service engineer at your convenience The installation will be done within 48 hours of delivery of the TV. The service engineer will install your new TV, either on wall mount or on table top. Installation and demo are provided free of cost. The engineer will also help you understand your new TV's features. The process generally covers: Wall-mounted or table-top installation, as requested. Physical check of all ports, including power and USB ports. Accessories also checked. Demonstration of features and settings Quick run-through on how to operate the TV
Description: Step into a world of audio immersion like never before with the Dolby Digital Plus incorporated into this TV. Immerse yourself in a three-dimensional soundscape that envelopes you in a 360-degree cinematic audio experience. With Dolby Digital Plus, every sound, every whisper, and every explosion comes to life, transporting you into the heart of your entertainment. Witness the power of Ultra Clean View as it unveils the true beauty of high-quality images with unparalleled precision. Using an advanced algorithm, this technology meticulously analyses the original content, reducing distortion and enhancing detail. The result? A crystal-clear picture that captivates your senses, making every scene a masterpiece of clarity. Indulge your senses in a world of vibrant colours and lifelike imagery with PurColor. This innovative technology allows your TV to express an extensive spectrum of colours, creating optimal picture performance that brings your favourite videos to life. Get ready to be captivated by an immersive viewing experience that feels like you're right there in the heart of the action. Prepare to be amazed as images burst to life with the Contrast Enhancer feature. This incredible technology adjusts the contrast of each frame, delivering unparalleled picture quality with enhanced depth and realism. Whether you're watching a thrilling action sequence or a serene landscape, every moment is enhanced for an unforgettable visual journey. Your beloved TV programs and movies have never looked this real. The Full HD resolution of this TV offers twice the clarity of HD, ensuring that every frame is a masterpiece of rich and vivid detail. Prepare to be captivated by a world of stunning visuals that redefine your entertainment experience. Elevate your viewing experience to new heights with High-Dynamic Range (HDR) technology. Say goodbye to dull and flat visuals, as HDR brings forth a dynamic range of bright expressions, enabling you to relish a mesmerising spectrum of colours and intricate visual details even within the depths of dark scenes. Experience a symphony of shadow and colour with Micro Dimming Pro. This remarkable technology divides the screen into zones, meticulously analysing each zone for deeper blacks and purer whites. The result is a picture that is as dynamic as life itself, with every shadow and highlights meticulously crafted for an unparalleled visual feast. Step into the world of your favourite movies with Film Mode. Immerse yourself in the director's vision as this technology faithfully reproduces a movie's colour tone, brightness, and other visual elements with unparalleled fidelity. Get ready to relive the magic of the big screen in the comfort of your own home. Cut the cords and enjoy a world of live-streaming TV content with this TV’s virtual channels. Just tune in and discover a treasure trove of entertainment that's ready to captivate your senses. Experience the synergy between your smartphone and Smart TV with seamless screen mirroring. Transform your TV into a canvas for your content, whether it's music, videos, or personal photos. And when you're ready to explore beyond, this TV’s smart browser brings the World Wide Web to your fingertips. Stay connected, learn, and discover new horizons, all from the comfort of your couch. Make your TV your personal entertainment hub with Connect Share Movie. Plug in your favourite media via USB and watch as your TV becomes a gateway to a world of videos, music, and photos. It's time to take control of your entertainment and enjoy it on your terms. Streamline your entertainment experience with the power of One Remote Function. Unleash the potential of one remote to navigate through a multitude of content, apps, and even live TV. Say goodbye to clutter and confusion, and say hello to a seamless and intuitive entertainment journey.

Description: Step into a world of audio immersion like never before with the Dolby Digital Plus incorporated into this TV. Immerse yourself in a three-dimensional soundscape that envelopes you in a 360-degree cinematic audio experience. With Dolby Digital Plus, every sound, every whisper, and every explosion comes to life, transporting you into the heart of your entertainment. Witness the power of Ultra Clean View as it unveils the true beauty of high-quality images with unparalleled precision. Using an advanced algorithm, this technology meticulously analyses the original content, reducing distortion and enhancing detail. The result? A crystal-clear picture that captivates your senses, making every scene a masterpiece of clarity. Indulge your senses in a world of vibrant colours and lifelike imagery with PurColor. This innovative technology allows your TV to express an extensive spectrum of colours, creating optimal picture performance that brings your favourite videos to life. Get ready to be captivated by an immersive viewing experience that feels like you're right there in the heart of the action. Prepare to be amazed as images burst to life with the Contrast Enhancer feature. This incredible technology adjusts the contrast of each frame, delivering unparalleled picture quality with enhanced depth and realism. Whether you're watching a thrilling action sequence or a serene landscape, every moment is enhanced for an unforgettable visual journey. Your beloved TV programs and movies have never looked this real. The Full HD resolution of this TV offers twice the clarity of HD, ensuring that every frame is a masterpiece of rich and vivid detail. Prepare to be captivated by a world of stunning visuals that redefine your entertainment experience. Elevate your viewing experience to new heights with High-Dynamic Range (HDR) technology. Say goodbye to dull and flat visuals, as HDR brings forth a dynamic range of bright expressions, enabling you to relish a mesmerising spectrum of colours and intricate visual details even within the depths of dark scenes. Experience a symphony of shadow and colour with Micro Dimming Pro. This remarkable technology divides the screen into zones, meticulously analysing each zone for deeper blacks and purer whites. The result is a picture that is as dynamic as life itself, with every shadow and highlights meticulously crafted for an unparalleled visual feast. Step into the world of your favourite movies with Film Mode. Immerse yourself in the director's vision as this technology faithfully reproduces a movie's colour tone, brightness, and other visual elements with unparalleled fidelity. Get ready to relive the magic of the big screen in the comfort of your own home. Cut the cords and enjoy a world of live-streaming TV content with this TV’s virtual channels. Just tune in and discover a treasure trove of entertainment that's ready to captivate your senses. Experience the synergy between your smartphone and Smart TV with seamless screen mirroring. Transform your TV into a canvas for your content, whether it's music, videos, or personal photos. And when you're ready to explore beyond, this TV’s smart browser brings the World Wide Web to your fingertips. Stay connected, learn, and discover new horizons, all from the comfort of your couch. Make your TV your personal entertainment hub with Connect Share Movie. Plug in your favourite media via USB and watch as your TV becomes a gateway to a world of videos, music, and photos. It's time to take control of your entertainment and enjoy it on your terms. Streamline your entertainment experience with the power of One Remote Function. Unleash the potential of one remote to navigate through a multitude of content, apps, and even live TV. Say goodbye to clutter and confusion, and say hello to a seamless and intuitive entertainment journey.

Description: With the Xiaomi TV, you can enjoy an infinite watching experience and wave goodbye to the limitations of regular TV frames. With a bezel-less design that maximises screen real estate and offers full-screen watching that immerses you in your favourite TV shows and movies like never before, all housed in a sleek, elegant metal frame. This contemporary style gives your living area a hint of elegance while also improving your viewing experience. Enjoy music like never before with the 20 W Dolby Audio on the Xiaomi TV. Your content experience is enhanced by the high-quality audio that this robust sound system provides. Every scene in an intense TV show, action-packed film, or your favourite music video is filled with rich, immersive audio that piques your interest thanks to Dolby Audio's captivating sound quality. With a sound that genuinely improves your enjoyment, you can hear every detail, feel every rhythm, and lose yourself in the moment. With Google TV effortlessly integrated into your Xiaomi TV, explore an endless universe of entertainment. Google TV organises everything for you, bringing together programmes, movies, live TV, and more from all of your subscriptions and applications. Enjoy a personalised entertainment experience and locate the ideal material with ease—no more never-ending scrolling or searching. Google TV makes sure you always have something amazing to watch, whether you're in the mood for the newest news, a series worth binge-watching, or a blockbuster movie. With Xiaomi TV+, you can enjoy a plethora of entertainment without having to worry about membership fees. With the help of this function, you can instantly access more than 150 free live TV channels that provide a variety of content types, such as news, sports, movies, series, music, and more. Your favourite entertainment is always only a click away with Xiaomi TV+, giving you a quicker and cleaner watching experience. Enter a world of entertainment that is only available on Xiaomi Smart TVs, offering limitless options and no expense. With its high-performance engineering, the Xiaomi TV guarantees an incredibly smooth viewing experience. The TV's quad-core A35 processor provides remarkable speed and responsiveness. You may experience fluid multitasking, fast app launches, and seamless navigation with 8 GB of storage and 1.5 GB of RAM. The robust performance of the Xiaomi TV ensures that everything runs smoothly whether you're playing games, surfing applications, or streaming high-definition video. With the very convenient Xiaomi Remote, you can take charge of your watching experience. When you need a little quiet time, the Quick Mute function lets you quickly mute the TV by double-tapping the volume down button. With the help of the Quick Wake function, you can instantly begin enjoying your favourite material on the TV in less than five seconds. Quick Settings makes it easy to access settings as well; just long-press the PatchWall button to bring up the Quick Settings menu. With complete control at your fingertips, the Xiaomi Remote enhances and streamlines your entertainment experience.

Description: With the Xiaomi TV, you can enjoy an infinite watching experience and wave goodbye to the limitations of regular TV frames. With a bezel-less design that maximises screen real estate and offers full-screen watching that immerses you in your favourite TV shows and movies like never before, all housed in a sleek, elegant metal frame. This contemporary style gives your living area a hint of elegance while also improving your viewing experience. Enjoy music like never before with the 20 W Dolby Audio on the Xiaomi TV. Your content experience is enhanced by the high-quality audio that this robust sound system provides. Every scene in an intense TV show, action-packed film, or your favourite music video is filled with rich, immersive audio that piques your interest thanks to Dolby Audio's captivating sound quality. With a sound that genuinely improves your enjoyment, you can hear every detail, feel every rhythm, and lose yourself in the moment. With Google TV effortlessly integrated into your Xiaomi TV, explore an endless universe of entertainment. Google TV organises everything for you, bringing together programmes, movies, live TV, and more from all of your subscriptions and applications. Enjoy a personalised entertainment experience and locate the ideal material with ease—no more never-ending scrolling or searching. Google TV makes sure you always have something amazing to watch, whether you're in the mood for the newest news, a series worth binge-watching, or a blockbuster movie. With Xiaomi TV+, you can enjoy a plethora of entertainment without having to worry about membership fees. With the help of this function, you can instantly access more than 150 free live TV channels that provide a variety of content types, such as news, sports, movies, series, music, and more. Your favourite entertainment is always only a click away with Xiaomi TV+, giving you a quicker and cleaner watching experience. Enter a world of entertainment that is only available on Xiaomi Smart TVs, offering limitless options and no expense. With its high-performance engineering, the Xiaomi TV guarantees an incredibly smooth viewing experience. The TV's quad-core A35 processor provides remarkable speed and responsiveness. You may experience fluid multitasking, fast app launches, and seamless navigation with 8 GB of storage and 1.5 GB of RAM. The robust performance of the Xiaomi TV ensures that everything runs smoothly whether you're playing games, surfing applications, or streaming high-definition video. With the very convenient Xiaomi Remote, you can take charge of your watching experience. When you need a little quiet time, the Quick Mute function lets you quickly mute the TV by double-tapping the volume down button. With the help of the Quick Wake function, you can instantly begin enjoying your favourite material on the TV in less than five seconds. Quick Settings makes it easy to access settings as well; just long-press the PatchWall button to bring up the Quick Settings menu. With complete control at your fingertips, the Xiaomi Remote enhances and streamlines your entertainment experience.
Review: Hi I am adding this review after 3+ months of use of this product... Brightness should be improved... 3/5Pic quality 4/5Sound 5/5 (dont need to go more than 25 out of 100)Looks premiumBuild quality 5/5No lagging issue Display size - more than enough

Covered Under Standard Installation - Table Mounting Using Standard Stand Supplied as Accessory with TV - Extra Charges are Applicable for Wall Mounts as, Rs. 399 for 32 inch Display Size and Rs. 499 for >32 inch Display Size - Connecting with Available Power Source (within 1 Meter) - Connecting / Setting Up Various Available Input Source for Audio Video Based on Model - Connecting with Available WiFi (for Smart TV) - Checking TV for Proper Functioning - Demonstration of the TV and its Features
Description: With the Xiaomi TV, you can enjoy an infinite watching experience and wave goodbye to the limitations of regular TV frames. With a bezel-less design that maximises screen real estate and offers full-screen watching that immerses you in your favourite TV shows and movies like never before, all housed in a sleek, elegant metal frame. This contemporary style gives your living area a hint of elegance while also improving your viewing experience. Enjoy music like never before with the 20 W Dolby Audio on the Xiaomi TV. Your content experience is enhanced by the high-quality audio that this robust sound system provides. Every scene in an intense TV show, action-packed film, or your favourite music video is filled with rich, immersive audio that piques your interest thanks to Dolby Audio's captivating sound quality. With a sound that genuinely improves your enjoyment, you can hear every detail, feel every rhythm, and lose yourself in the moment. With Google TV effortlessly integrated into your Xiaomi TV, explore an endless universe of entertainment. Google TV organises everything for you, bringing together programmes, movies, live TV, and more from all of your subscriptions and applications. Enjoy a personalised entertainment experience and locate the ideal material with ease—no more never-ending scrolling or searching. Google TV makes sure you always have something amazing to watch, whether you're in the mood for the newest news, a series worth binge-watching, or a blockbuster movie. With Xiaomi TV+, you can enjoy a plethora of entertainment without having to worry about membership fees. With the help of this function, you can instantly access more than 150 free live TV channels that provide a variety of content types, such as news, sports, movies, series, music, and more. Your favourite entertainment is always only a click away with Xiaomi TV+, giving you a quicker and cleaner watching experience. Enter a world of entertainment that is only available on Xiaomi Smart TVs, offering limitless options and no expense. With its high-performance engineering, the Xiaomi TV guarantees an incredibly smooth viewing experience. The TV's quad-core A35 processor provides remarkable speed and responsiveness. You may experience fluid multitasking, fast app launches, and seamless navigation with 8 GB of storage and 1.5 GB of RAM. The robust performance of the Xiaomi TV ensures that everything runs smoothly whether you're playing games, surfing applications, or streaming high-definition video. With the very convenient Xiaomi Remote, you can take charge of your watching experience. When you need a little quiet time, the Quick Mute function lets you quickly mute the TV by double-tapping the volume down button. With the help of the Quick Wake function, you can instantly begin enjoying your favourite material on the TV in less than five seconds. Quick Settings makes it easy to access settings as well; just long-press the PatchWall button to bring up the Quick Settings menu. With complete control at your fingertips, the Xiaomi Remote enhances and streamlines your entertainment experience.
Review: Good

Product: TCL 79.97 cm (32 inch) Full HD LED Smart Android TV with Metallic Bezel Less and Chromecast built-in  (32S5500AF)
Specification: In The Box : 1 Unit TV, Stand, User Manual, Warranty Card, Remote Control, 2 Batteries Model Name : 32S5500AF Display Size : 79.97 cm (32 inch) Screen Type : LED HD Technology & Resolution : Full HD, 1920 x 1080 Smart Tv : Yes HDMI : 2 USB : 1 Built In Wi-Fi : Yes Launch Year : 2024 Wall Mount Included : No Brightness : 260 nits Contrast Ratio : 4000:01:00 (Static) View Angle : 178 Degree Panel Type : LED LED Display Type : DLED Aspect Ratio : 16:09 Refresh Rate : 60 Hz Number of Speakers : 2 Speaker Output RMS : 24 W Ram Capacity : 1 GB Storage Memory : 8 GB Supported App - Netflix : Yes Supported App - Youtube : Yes Supported App - Disney+Hotstar : Yes Supported App - Prime Video : Yes Operating System Present : Yes Operating System : Android Screen Mirroring : Yes App Store Type : Google Play Store Bluetooth : Yes Built In Wi-Fi : Yes HDMI : 2 Side USB : 1 Side Touch Remote : No Smart Remote : Yes Internet Access : Yes Battery Type : 2 AAA  Batteries Power Requirement : AC 100 - 240 V Power Consumption : 0.5 W (Standby) Clock : Yes Sleep Timer : Yes Width x Height x Depth (without stand) : 715 mm x 421 mm x 42 mm Weight (without stand) : 3.4 kg Width x Height x Depth (with stand) : 180 mm Stand Type : Table Top, Wall Mount Warranty Summary : 1 Year Warranty Covered in Warranty : Defect Arising Out of Faulty or Defective Material or Workmanship. Parts and Labour Costs are Covered in Warranty. Not Covered in Warranty : Damages Resulting from Un-authorised Adaptations or Adjustment. External Accessories (Such as Battery, Cable Etc). Damages Caused to the Product by Accident, Lightening, Ingress of Water, Fire, Dropping or Excessive Shock. If Product Serial No has been Altered, Removed or Defaced. Damages Caused by Improper Installation, 3rd Party Equipment or Software and Media Used. If Product is Used in Commercial, Business, Industrial, Educational and Rental Applications Warranty Service Type : On-site Installation & Demo Details : We'll facilitate the installation and demo through an authorized service engineer at your convenience post delivery. The service engineer will install your new TV, either on wall mount or on table top. Charges for wall mount bracket (Rs.299 +18% GST) and additional accessories will be applicable. If customer uses his own wall mount bracket fixing charges will be applicable. The engineer will also help you understand your new TV's features. The process generally covers: Wall-mounted or table-top installation, as requested. Physical check of all ports, including power and USB ports. Accessories also checked. Demonstration of features and settings Quick run-through on how to operate the TV.
Description: Enjoy a viewing experience that is 2X the clarity of standard HD TVs with a resolution of 1920 x 1080. A+ Grade Full HD Panel provides clear, detailed images that make for an engaging viewing experience. High dynamic range (HDR), provides a superior experience with striking brightness, exceptional shadow detail, and vivid colour. Sit still and enjoy incredible picture details as the filmmakers intended. Micro Dimming analyses the TV content in 2,304 separate zones to adjust the brightness and darkness. Have a wonderful viewing experience with excellent contrast, especially in low-light environments. Inserted Dolby Decoder, giving you a memorable viewing experience with a pure, deep, and impactful sound. The latest powerful speakers bring you a more immersive and surrounding experience. With a clear interface, TCL Android TV allows you to easily watch 400,000+ movies and shows, as well as cast photos, videos, and music from your smart devices to the screen. The bezel-less design allows a full-screen and wider visible viewing experience, just feels right amongst all the action. Different scene modes are customized for you. Explore endless content and discover a world of entertainment at your fingertips with the integrated YouTube app on your TV, offering a seamless and immersive viewing experience right from the comfort of your living room. Find your favorite Movies & shows on NETFLIX and watch them together with your loved ones. Discover thousands of movies in 1 app with just 1 click. Stream faster, further, and more stably with Bluetooth 5.0, HDMI x 2, and USB 2.0 x 1.
Review: Good 👍

Description: Enjoy a viewing experience that is 2X the clarity of standard HD TVs with a resolution of 1920 x 1080. A+ Grade Full HD Panel provides clear, detailed images that make for an engaging viewing experience. High dynamic range (HDR), provides a superior experience with striking brightness, exceptional shadow detail, and vivid colour. Sit still and enjoy incredible picture details as the filmmakers intended. Micro Dimming analyses the TV content in 2,304 separate zones to adjust the brightness and darkness. Have a wonderful viewing experience with excellent contrast, especially in low-light environments. Inserted Dolby Decoder, giving you a memorable viewing experience with a pure, deep, and impactful sound. The latest powerful speakers bring you a more immersive and surrounding experience. With a clear interface, TCL Android TV allows you to easily watch 400,000+ movies and shows, as well as cast photos, videos, and music from your smart devices to the screen. The bezel-less design allows a full-screen and wider visible viewing experience, just feels right amongst all the action. Different scene modes are customized for you. Explore endless content and discover a world of entertainment at your fingertips with the integrated YouTube app on your TV, offering a seamless and immersive viewing experience right from the comfort of your living room. Find your favorite Movies & shows on NETFLIX and watch them together with your loved ones. Discover thousands of movies in 1 app with just 1 click. Stream faster, further, and more stably with Bluetooth 5.0, HDMI x 2, and USB 2.0 x 1.

Description: Prepare for an eye-popping visual feast with HDR 10 technology. Witness awesome colours, perfect detail, and exceptional brightness that will leave you saying WOW. The smart AiPQ Processor detects your environment and intelligently scales the display and audio to enhance overall functionality. Sit back and let it optimize your viewing experience. With high-penetration screen display technology, T-SCREEN ensures enhanced backlight efficiency, delivering a clearer and more vibrant picture. Experience vivid and lifelike colours like never before, thanks to Dynamic Contrast and True Colour technology. Dive into the minutiae of every image with Ai-Clarity. Restore intricate details and see the reality with crystal clarity. Immerse yourself in rich and crystal-clear audio with Dolby Audio. Feel like you're part of the action with its realistic sound. Enjoy a rich and powerful surround sound experience thanks to the integrated speaker boxes. Choose from a range of sound modes including Standard, Dynamic, Music, Movie, Voice, Game, and Sports to suit your preferences and content. Access over 100,000 movies and shows from streaming giants like Netflix, YouTube, and Disney+ directly from your TV. Discover a world of entertainment with access to a vast array of apps and streaming platforms. The sleek metallic bezel-less design offers a full-screen viewing experience, immersing you completely in the action. Powered by a 64-bit Quad-Core Processor with G31MP2 GPU and 8 GB Storage + 1 GB RAM for seamless performance. Stay connected with Bluetooth 5.0, WiFi, HDMI x 2, and USB 2.0 x 1, ensuring faster, further, and more stable streaming. Stream content from your Macs, laptops, iPads, and phones directly to the big screen with built-in Chromecast. Transform your living room into a cinematic heaven with Movie Mode, Game Mode, and Sports Mode, each tailored to enhance your viewing experience. Experience the immersive sound and a true-to-life visual experience for the ultimate movie night at home. Unleash the full potential of your gaming experience with our TV's Game Mode, delivering seamless graphics and minimal lag. Feel the excitement of every game with Sports Mode, immersing yourself in the heart-pounding action.

The process generally covers: Wall-mounted or table-top installation, as requested. Physical check of all ports, including power and USB ports. Accessories also checked. Demonstration of features and settings Quick run-through on how to operate the TV.
Description: Prepare for an eye-popping visual feast with HDR 10 technology. Witness awesome colours, perfect detail, and exceptional brightness that will leave you saying WOW. The smart AiPQ Processor detects your environment and intelligently scales the display and audio to enhance overall functionality. Sit back and let it optimize your viewing experience. With high-penetration screen display technology, T-SCREEN ensures enhanced backlight efficiency, delivering a clearer and more vibrant picture. Experience vivid and lifelike colours like never before, thanks to Dynamic Contrast and True Colour technology. Dive into the minutiae of every image with Ai-Clarity. Restore intricate details and see the reality with crystal clarity. Immerse yourself in rich and crystal-clear audio with Dolby Audio. Feel like you're part of the action with its realistic sound. Enjoy a rich and powerful surround sound experience thanks to the integrated speaker boxes. Choose from a range of sound modes including Standard, Dynamic, Music, Movie, Voice, Game, and Sports to suit your preferences and content. Access over 100,000 movies and shows from streaming giants like Netflix, YouTube, and Disney+ directly from your TV. Discover a world of entertainment with access to a vast array of apps and streaming platforms. The sleek metallic bezel-less design offers a full-screen viewing experience, immersing you completely in the action. Powered by a 64-bit Quad-Core Processor with G31MP2 GPU and 8 GB Storage + 1 GB RAM for seamless performance. Stay connected with Bluetooth 5.0, WiFi, HDMI x 2, and USB 2.0 x 1, ensuring faster, further, and more stable streaming. Stream content from your Macs, laptops, iPads, and phones directly to the big screen with built-in Chromecast. Transform your living room into a cinematic heaven with Movie Mode, Game Mode, and Sports Mode, each tailored to enhance your viewing experience. Experience the immersive sound and a true-to-life visual experience for the ultimate movie night at home. Unleash the full potential of your gaming experience with our TV's Game Mode, delivering seamless graphics and minimal lag. Feel the excitement of every game with Sports Mode, immersing yourself in the heart-pounding action.

Access over 100,000 movies and shows from streaming giants like Netflix, YouTube, and Disney+ directly from your TV. Discover a world of entertainment with access to a vast array of apps and streaming platforms. The sleek metallic bezel-less design offers a full-screen viewing experience, immersing you completely in the action. Powered by a 64-bit Quad-Core Processor with G31MP2 GPU and 8 GB Storage + 1 GB RAM for seamless performance. Stay connected with Bluetooth 5.0, WiFi, HDMI x 2, and USB 2.0 x 1, ensuring faster, further, and more stable streaming. Stream content from your Macs, laptops, iPads, and phones directly to the big screen with built-in Chromecast. Transform your living room into a cinematic heaven with Movie Mode, Game Mode, and Sports Mode, each tailored to enhance your viewing experience. Experience the immersive sound and a true-to-life visual experience for the ultimate movie night at home. Unleash the full potential of your gaming experience with our TV's Game Mode, delivering seamless graphics and minimal lag. Feel the excitement of every game with Sports Mode, immersing yourself in the heart-pounding action.
Review: Best budget tv tcl 32 inch values for money

Description: This LG HD TV offers exceptional visuals through rich colours. You can experience your favourite characters come to life on this TV. It makes your visual experience more realistic and natural. This TV is equipped with an α5 Gen5 AI Processor which enhances the quality of the visuals delivered on this LG TV. You can have an immersive viewing experience on this TV. This TV features an AI 5.1 surround sound audio system to offer an immersive audio-visual experience. You can enjoy a theatre-like audio experience in the comfort of your home with this TV. The Dynamic Tone Mapping feature of this TV applies the optional tone curve to the visuals to make them more natural. It enhances the picture quality by adjusting the contrast and detailing of the visuals. You can get access to unlimited entertainment on this TV by streaming through the OTT platforms. You can access Netflix, Prime Video, Apple TV+, and Disney+ Hotstar on this TV to watch your favourite content. With the HDR10 technology, this TV automatically adjusts the brightness level to enhance the quality and clarity of the visual produced. You can experience realistic visuals on this TV with HDR10. You can enjoy game nights with your friends and family, thanks to Game Dashboard, Game Optimiser, and HGiG. You can optimise your game settings through Game Optimiser and Dashboard. Its quick refresh rate allows you to compete in real-time and reign over the gaming world. With the HGiG you can enjoy playing HDR games on this TV. You can immerse yourself in intense gaming and explore what the gaming world has to offer. You can enjoy watching personalised content by logging into your account. You can get content suggestions based on your watch history and forget the hassle of searching for your desired content with WebOS. The ThinQ AI technology featured in this LG TV offers a personalised and smart viewing experience. (Magic Remote to be purchased separately.) The Sport Alert feature of this TV allows you to receive notifications before every game so you do not miss any important matches be it cricket, football, tennis, or hockey.
Review: Value for money

Description: This LG HD TV offers exceptional visuals through rich colours. You can experience your favourite characters come to life on this TV. It makes your visual experience more realistic and natural. This TV is equipped with an α5 Gen5 AI Processor which enhances the quality of the visuals delivered on this LG TV. You can have an immersive viewing experience on this TV. This TV features an AI 5.1 surround sound audio system to offer an immersive audio-visual experience. You can enjoy a theatre-like audio experience in the comfort of your home with this TV. The Dynamic Tone Mapping feature of this TV applies the optional tone curve to the visuals to make them more natural. It enhances the picture quality by adjusting the contrast and detailing of the visuals. You can get access to unlimited entertainment on this TV by streaming through the OTT platforms. You can access Netflix, Prime Video, Apple TV+, and Disney+ Hotstar on this TV to watch your favourite content. With the HDR10 technology, this TV automatically adjusts the brightness level to enhance the quality and clarity of the visual produced. You can experience realistic visuals on this TV with HDR10. You can enjoy game nights with your friends and family, thanks to Game Dashboard, Game Optimiser, and HGiG. You can optimise your game settings through Game Optimiser and Dashboard. Its quick refresh rate allows you to compete in real-time and reign over the gaming world. With the HGiG you can enjoy playing HDR games on this TV. You can immerse yourself in intense gaming and explore what the gaming world has to offer. You can enjoy watching personalised content by logging into your account. You can get content suggestions based on your watch history and forget the hassle of searching for your desired content with WebOS. The ThinQ AI technology featured in this LG TV offers a personalised and smart viewing experience. (Magic Remote to be purchased separately.) The Sport Alert feature of this TV allows you to receive notifications before every game so you do not miss any important matches be it cricket, football, tennis, or hockey.

Description: Set your stage for the ultimate viewing experience with the availability of 6 picture modes. This TV offers a crystal-clear display and has 1.07 billion vibrant colors that provide lifelike images. With a wide 178-degree viewing angle, you will enjoy your television time to the fullest. Enjoy your TV time with loud and clear audio powered by Dolby technology and have an immersive experience. The 20-watt speakers are very powerful and produce thunderous sound. The 4 sound modes, along with the 3D audio, will take you beyond the screen. Have constant fun and bid adieu to all your dull moments with this Google TV, where you will not just explore the internet at ease but will also binge-watch your favourite shows and movies without any lag. This Motorola TV is sleek and comes with 2 GB RAM and 16 GB ROM. It has a Mediatek quad-core processor that brings seamless navigation, lets you multitask, and offers ample storage space for all your content. The built-in graphics in this TV will further enhance your TV-viewing experience. With the availability of a built-in Chromecast, you can easily cast your favourite movies, shows, etc., from your phone to your TV and enjoy watching them on the big screen.

Description: Set your stage for the ultimate viewing experience with the availability of 6 picture modes. This TV offers a crystal-clear display and has 1.07 billion vibrant colors that provide lifelike images. With a wide 178-degree viewing angle, you will enjoy your television time to the fullest. Enjoy your TV time with loud and clear audio powered by Dolby technology and have an immersive experience. The 20-watt speakers are very powerful and produce thunderous sound. The 4 sound modes, along with the 3D audio, will take you beyond the screen. Have constant fun and bid adieu to all your dull moments with this Google TV, where you will not just explore the internet at ease but will also binge-watch your favourite shows and movies without any lag. This Motorola TV is sleek and comes with 2 GB RAM and 16 GB ROM. It has a Mediatek quad-core processor that brings seamless navigation, lets you multitask, and offers ample storage space for all your content. The built-in graphics in this TV will further enhance your TV-viewing experience. With the availability of a built-in Chromecast, you can easily cast your favourite movies, shows, etc., from your phone to your TV and enjoy watching them on the big screen.
Review: Excellent tv value of money

Description: Set your stage for the ultimate viewing experience with the availability of 6 picture modes. This TV offers a crystal-clear display and has 1.07 billion vibrant colors that provide lifelike images. With a wide 178-degree viewing angle, you will enjoy your television time to the fullest. Enjoy your TV time with loud and clear audio powered by Dolby technology and have an immersive experience. The 20-watt speakers are very powerful and produce thunderous sound. The 4 sound modes, along with the 3D audio, will take you beyond the screen. Have constant fun and bid adieu to all your dull moments with this Google TV, where you will not just explore the internet at ease but will also binge-watch your favourite shows and movies without any lag. This Motorola TV is sleek and comes with 2 GB RAM and 16 GB ROM. It has a Mediatek quad-core processor that brings seamless navigation, lets you multitask, and offers ample storage space for all your content. The built-in graphics in this TV will further enhance your TV-viewing experience. With the availability of a built-in Chromecast, you can easily cast your favourite movies, shows, etc., from your phone to your TV and enjoy watching them on the big screen.
Review: Excellent

Description: Introducing the Xiaomi TV, a masterpiece of innovation and cutting-edge technology that redefines the way you experience entertainment. Immerse yourself in a world of seamless viewing with the premium metal bezel-less Design that engulfs your senses and elevates your living room to an artistic masterpiece. Behold the Millionaire Display! Every scene comes to life on the stunning HD screen, boasting a rich colour gamut that can showcase over 16 million vibrant hues. Prepare to be dazzled by lifelike pictures that jump off the screen, making you feel like you're part of the action. To ensure an unparalleled visual feast, we've integrated our proprietary Vivid Picture Engine. This revolutionary technology meticulously fine-tunes colour, contrast, and depth to perfection with every single visual. Each frame is a masterpiece, and every moment becomes unforgettable. The Xiaomi TV is equipped with a jaw-dropping 20 W Dolby Audio system that will leave you mesmerised. Elevate your content to new heights with riveting, high-quality sound that perfectly complements the visuals. Once you experience Dolby Audio, you'll never settle for anything less. Step into the realm of premium surround sound with DTS Virtual X, a first-in-segment feature that will transport you into the heart of every scene. Feel the thrill of action-packed movies, the emotion of heartwarming dramas, and the adrenaline rush of sports events, all from the comfort of your home. Immerse yourself in a sound experience so real that you'll forget you're sitting on your couch. We know that your entertainment needs are diverse, so we've partnered with Google TV to bring all your favourite movies, shows, live TV, and more from various apps and subscriptions together in one unified interface, curated just for you. Say goodbye to endless scrolling and searching - now you can spend more time enjoying and less time finding. This TV features Patchwall+, a treasure trove of free live TV channels spanning 200+ options. Delight in a wide range of content that caters to every taste, from news and sports to movies and lifestyle shows. The possibilities are endless with Xiaomi TV. Powering this seamless entertainment experience is the Quad Core A35 chip, delivering superior performance that makes every moment splendidly smooth. No lags, no buffering, just pure entertainment bliss. Whether you're streaming your favourite shows, playing games, or watching live TV, you'll notice the difference in performance right away.
Review: Nice

Description: Introducing the Xiaomi TV, a masterpiece of innovation and cutting-edge technology that redefines the way you experience entertainment. Immerse yourself in a world of seamless viewing with the premium metal bezel-less Design that engulfs your senses and elevates your living room to an artistic masterpiece. Behold the Millionaire Display! Every scene comes to life on the stunning HD screen, boasting a rich colour gamut that can showcase over 16 million vibrant hues. Prepare to be dazzled by lifelike pictures that jump off the screen, making you feel like you're part of the action. To ensure an unparalleled visual feast, we've integrated our proprietary Vivid Picture Engine. This revolutionary technology meticulously fine-tunes colour, contrast, and depth to perfection with every single visual. Each frame is a masterpiece, and every moment becomes unforgettable. The Xiaomi TV is equipped with a jaw-dropping 20 W Dolby Audio system that will leave you mesmerised. Elevate your content to new heights with riveting, high-quality sound that perfectly complements the visuals. Once you experience Dolby Audio, you'll never settle for anything less. Step into the realm of premium surround sound with DTS Virtual X, a first-in-segment feature that will transport you into the heart of every scene. Feel the thrill of action-packed movies, the emotion of heartwarming dramas, and the adrenaline rush of sports events, all from the comfort of your home. Immerse yourself in a sound experience so real that you'll forget you're sitting on your couch. We know that your entertainment needs are diverse, so we've partnered with Google TV to bring all your favourite movies, shows, live TV, and more from various apps and subscriptions together in one unified interface, curated just for you. Say goodbye to endless scrolling and searching - now you can spend more time enjoying and less time finding. This TV features Patchwall+, a treasure trove of free live TV channels spanning 200+ options. Delight in a wide range of content that caters to every taste, from news and sports to movies and lifestyle shows. The possibilities are endless with Xiaomi TV. Powering this seamless entertainment experience is the Quad Core A35 chip, delivering superior performance that makes every moment splendidly smooth. No lags, no buffering, just pure entertainment bliss. Whether you're streaming your favourite shows, playing games, or watching live TV, you'll notice the difference in performance right away.
Review: Tv was awesome looking slim and fabulous and I value for money totally happy

Description: Introducing the Xiaomi TV, a masterpiece of innovation and cutting-edge technology that redefines the way you experience entertainment. Immerse yourself in a world of seamless viewing with the premium metal bezel-less Design that engulfs your senses and elevates your living room to an artistic masterpiece. Behold the Millionaire Display! Every scene comes to life on the stunning HD screen, boasting a rich colour gamut that can showcase over 16 million vibrant hues. Prepare to be dazzled by lifelike pictures that jump off the screen, making you feel like you're part of the action. To ensure an unparalleled visual feast, we've integrated our proprietary Vivid Picture Engine. This revolutionary technology meticulously fine-tunes colour, contrast, and depth to perfection with every single visual. Each frame is a masterpiece, and every moment becomes unforgettable. The Xiaomi TV is equipped with a jaw-dropping 20 W Dolby Audio system that will leave you mesmerised. Elevate your content to new heights with riveting, high-quality sound that perfectly complements the visuals. Once you experience Dolby Audio, you'll never settle for anything less. Step into the realm of premium surround sound with DTS Virtual X, a first-in-segment feature that will transport you into the heart of every scene. Feel the thrill of action-packed movies, the emotion of heartwarming dramas, and the adrenaline rush of sports events, all from the comfort of your home. Immerse yourself in a sound experience so real that you'll forget you're sitting on your couch. We know that your entertainment needs are diverse, so we've partnered with Google TV to bring all your favourite movies, shows, live TV, and more from various apps and subscriptions together in one unified interface, curated just for you. Say goodbye to endless scrolling and searching - now you can spend more time enjoying and less time finding. This TV features Patchwall+, a treasure trove of free live TV channels spanning 200+ options. Delight in a wide range of content that caters to every taste, from news and sports to movies and lifestyle shows. The possibilities are endless with Xiaomi TV. Powering this seamless entertainment experience is the Quad Core A35 chip, delivering superior performance that makes every moment splendidly smooth. No lags, no buffering, just pure entertainment bliss. Whether you're streaming your favourite shows, playing games, or watching live TV, you'll notice the difference in performance right away.

Description: The iFFALCON S53 TV delivers a Full HD viewing experience with a stunning resolution of 1920x1080. This isn't just high-definition; it's 2x the clarity of standard HD TVs. Whether you're watching your favourite movie, indulging in gaming, or simply catching up on your beloved TV shows, every detail pops with exceptional clarity. Prepare to be enthralled as the TV's Micro Dimming technology takes center stage. It's like having an intelligent lighting technician inside your television. With a remarkable 2,304 separate zones, this technology adjusts brightness and darkness intelligently, providing you with the perfect balance of light and shadow. Witness scenes come to life with the precision and depth they deserve. Step into a world where colours are no longer limited – the iFFALCON S53 TV boasts a mesmerising display of up to 1.07 billion colours. Each shade is rendered with pinpoint precision, ensuring smoother transitions and a visual feast for your eyes. Whether it's the lush greens of a tropical paradise or the deep blues of a serene ocean, every hue is pure and vibrant. Elevate your auditory senses with the powerful Dolby Audio on the iFFALCON S53 TV. Whether it's the roar of a sports crowd, the dialogues of your favourite TV show, or the soundtrack of your cherished movie, the sound quality will leave you in awe. Immerse yourself in the crystal-clear, rich, and dynamic audio that complements your viewing experience perfectly. No need for external speakers – the iFFALCON S53 TV integrates 24 watts of pure audio power into its sleek frame. The result? A rich, clear, and powerful surround sound that envelopes you in a world of entertainment. Feel the rumble of action scenes and the subtlety of dialogue like never before. Your audio preferences are as diverse as your entertainment choices. The iFFALCON S53 TV understands this perfectly, offering an array of sound modes to suit your mood and content. Whether you're in the mood for a cinematic experience, music, gaming, or simply enjoying a chat show, choose from Standard, Dynamic, Music, Movie, Voice, Game, or Sports sound modes to enhance your audio experience. The iFFALCON S53 TV redefines the aesthetics of television with its 3-sided bezel-less design. This frameless wonder not only provides a full-screen viewing experience but also adds a touch of elegance to any room. Immerse yourself in the content without distractions – it's all about the visuals. Gone are the days of huddling in the perfect spot to watch TV. The iFFALCON S53 TV employs wide viewing angle technology, ensuring a fantastic 178-degree-wide viewing experience. Whether you're sitting dead center or at an angle, everyone in the room enjoys the same incredible picture quality. Prepare to explore a universe of possibilities with Android 11. This TV isn't just a screen; it's a gateway to a world of entertainment. With speed and security upgrades, access over 7,000 apps and a staggering 700,000 shows and movies in one convenient place. It's your personal playground of entertainment, and it's just a click away. Finding your favourite movies, and apps, or controlling your smart TV and other devices has never been easier. Say hello to OK Google, your trusty voice assistant. Simply use your voice commands to navigate, search, and control your TV effortlessly. It's like having your very own genie at your service. The iFFALCON S53 TV brings you not just your favourite shows and movies but also an unrivaled range of apps and streaming platforms. Whether it's the latest blockbuster, a timeless classic, or exclusive content from your favourite streaming service, you'll never run out of options. Why limit your content to your TV? With Chromecast built-in, you can effortlessly cast your videos, games, and apps from your mobile device to the big screen. Share your memories, showcase your skills, and immerse yourself in the endless world of online content. Behind the scenes, the iFFALCON S53 TV is powered by a 64-bit Quad-core Processor with a G31MP2 GPU and 8 GB of storage, complemented by 1 GB of RAM. This powerhouse ensures lightning-fast performance, smooth multitasking, and seamless navigation through your favourite apps and content. When it comes to connectivity, the iFFALCON S53 TV excels. Stream faster, further, and more stably with Bluetooth 5.0, HDMI x 2, and USB 2.0 x 1. Share your content effortlessly, connect your devices seamlessly, and enjoy a truly immersive experience without any interruptions.
Review: Pros1. Automatic Connectivity with wifi hotspot is better than mi Android box.2. Remote with Superb handy design and quality buttons3. Multiple picture settings allow us to suit our needs.4. Bluetooth headphones can be connected5. Almost all apps working fine and smoothCons:-1. The picture quality is good and not at all whitish screen like low budget tv; But the best picture quality is only visible while sitting directly on front of tv, if we move a bit from the exact front, it reduce...

Description: The iFFALCON S53 TV delivers a Full HD viewing experience with a stunning resolution of 1920x1080. This isn't just high-definition; it's 2x the clarity of standard HD TVs. Whether you're watching your favourite movie, indulging in gaming, or simply catching up on your beloved TV shows, every detail pops with exceptional clarity. Prepare to be enthralled as the TV's Micro Dimming technology takes center stage. It's like having an intelligent lighting technician inside your television. With a remarkable 2,304 separate zones, this technology adjusts brightness and darkness intelligently, providing you with the perfect balance of light and shadow. Witness scenes come to life with the precision and depth they deserve. Step into a world where colours are no longer limited – the iFFALCON S53 TV boasts a mesmerising display of up to 1.07 billion colours. Each shade is rendered with pinpoint precision, ensuring smoother transitions and a visual feast for your eyes. Whether it's the lush greens of a tropical paradise or the deep blues of a serene ocean, every hue is pure and vibrant. Elevate your auditory senses with the powerful Dolby Audio on the iFFALCON S53 TV. Whether it's the roar of a sports crowd, the dialogues of your favourite TV show, or the soundtrack of your cherished movie, the sound quality will leave you in awe. Immerse yourself in the crystal-clear, rich, and dynamic audio that complements your viewing experience perfectly. No need for external speakers – the iFFALCON S53 TV integrates 24 watts of pure audio power into its sleek frame. The result? A rich, clear, and powerful surround sound that envelopes you in a world of entertainment. Feel the rumble of action scenes and the subtlety of dialogue like never before. Your audio preferences are as diverse as your entertainment choices. The iFFALCON S53 TV understands this perfectly, offering an array of sound modes to suit your mood and content. Whether you're in the mood for a cinematic experience, music, gaming, or simply enjoying a chat show, choose from Standard, Dynamic, Music, Movie, Voice, Game, or Sports sound modes to enhance your audio experience. The iFFALCON S53 TV redefines the aesthetics of television with its 3-sided bezel-less design. This frameless wonder not only provides a full-screen viewing experience but also adds a touch of elegance to any room. Immerse yourself in the content without distractions – it's all about the visuals. Gone are the days of huddling in the perfect spot to watch TV. The iFFALCON S53 TV employs wide viewing angle technology, ensuring a fantastic 178-degree-wide viewing experience. Whether you're sitting dead center or at an angle, everyone in the room enjoys the same incredible picture quality. Prepare to explore a universe of possibilities with Android 11. This TV isn't just a screen; it's a gateway to a world of entertainment. With speed and security upgrades, access over 7,000 apps and a staggering 700,000 shows and movies in one convenient place. It's your personal playground of entertainment, and it's just a click away. Finding your favourite movies, and apps, or controlling your smart TV and other devices has never been easier. Say hello to OK Google, your trusty voice assistant. Simply use your voice commands to navigate, search, and control your TV effortlessly. It's like having your very own genie at your service. The iFFALCON S53 TV brings you not just your favourite shows and movies but also an unrivaled range of apps and streaming platforms. Whether it's the latest blockbuster, a timeless classic, or exclusive content from your favourite streaming service, you'll never run out of options. Why limit your content to your TV? With Chromecast built-in, you can effortlessly cast your videos, games, and apps from your mobile device to the big screen. Share your memories, showcase your skills, and immerse yourself in the endless world of online content. Behind the scenes, the iFFALCON S53 TV is powered by a 64-bit Quad-core Processor with a G31MP2 GPU and 8 GB of storage, complemented by 1 GB of RAM. This powerhouse ensures lightning-fast performance, smooth multitasking, and seamless navigation through your favourite apps and content. When it comes to connectivity, the iFFALCON S53 TV excels. Stream faster, further, and more stably with Bluetooth 5.0, HDMI x 2, and USB 2.0 x 1. Share your content effortlessly, connect your devices seamlessly, and enjoy a truly immersive experience without any interruptions.

Description: The iFFALCON TV's implementation of High Dynamic Range (HDR) offers an outstanding viewing experience with eye-catching brightness, excellent shadow definition, and vibrant colour replication. You can then relax and take in the exquisite image details as the filmmakers intended. When watching films and natural photographs, the Dynamic Colour Enhancement algorithm of this TV can augment the display impact of the low colour display to high colour display, bringing them to life. Dolby Audio's Enhanced Loudness technology provides powerful intensity even on compact speaker devices to create a massive amount of audio, allowing you to relish every sound. Dolby decoder technology also produces panoramic surround sound, which improves the TV's audio experience. You can easily explore the latest movies and TV series from all of your subscriptions by using the Google TV function built into this TV, ensuring that you never run out of entertainment options. Finding your next favourite is also made convenient by recommendations based on what you've watched and what interests you. With iFFALCON TV's intelligent voice control capability, you can choose the channel, watch your favourite programmes, and even get simple questions answered. You can enjoy movie theatre-quality sound in your living room thanks to eARC, which facilitates the TV audio coming from cable, satellite, streaming, or source devices to be transmitted to an AVR or sound bar through a single HDMI cable. This enables an engaging multi-dimensional encounter and augmented detail and intensity. You can feel all the actions as though they were taking place right in front of you thanks to the 3-sided, frameless design of this TV that facilitates a wide real estate for the screen and enhances your visual experience.
Review: Pros1. Automatic Connectivity with wifi hotspot is better than mi Android box.2. Remote with Superb handy design and quality buttons3. Multiple picture settings allow us to suit our needs.4. Bluetooth headphones can be connected5. Almost all apps working fine and smoothCons:-1. The picture quality is good and not at all whitish screen like low budget tv; But the best picture quality is only visible while sitting directly on front of tv, if we move a bit from the exact front, it reduce...

Description: The iFFALCON TV's implementation of High Dynamic Range (HDR) offers an outstanding viewing experience with eye-catching brightness, excellent shadow definition, and vibrant colour replication. You can then relax and take in the exquisite image details as the filmmakers intended. When watching films and natural photographs, the Dynamic Colour Enhancement algorithm of this TV can augment the display impact of the low colour display to high colour display, bringing them to life. Dolby Audio's Enhanced Loudness technology provides powerful intensity even on compact speaker devices to create a massive amount of audio, allowing you to relish every sound. Dolby decoder technology also produces panoramic surround sound, which improves the TV's audio experience. You can easily explore the latest movies and TV series from all of your subscriptions by using the Google TV function built into this TV, ensuring that you never run out of entertainment options. Finding your next favourite is also made convenient by recommendations based on what you've watched and what interests you. With iFFALCON TV's intelligent voice control capability, you can choose the channel, watch your favourite programmes, and even get simple questions answered. You can enjoy movie theatre-quality sound in your living room thanks to eARC, which facilitates the TV audio coming from cable, satellite, streaming, or source devices to be transmitted to an AVR or sound bar through a single HDMI cable. This enables an engaging multi-dimensional encounter and augmented detail and intensity. You can feel all the actions as though they were taking place right in front of you thanks to the 3-sided, frameless design of this TV that facilitates a wide real estate for the screen and enhances your visual experience.
Review: Good choice for overall experience. I am using iFFalcon for almost 5 years.Screen quality is goodSound awesome 4K HDR 10 greatGoogle TV works fast with 2 GB  ram

Description: The iFFALCON TV's implementation of High Dynamic Range (HDR) offers an outstanding viewing experience with eye-catching brightness, excellent shadow definition, and vibrant colour replication. You can then relax and take in the exquisite image details as the filmmakers intended. When watching films and natural photographs, the Dynamic Colour Enhancement algorithm of this TV can augment the display impact of the low colour display to high colour display, bringing them to life. Dolby Audio's Enhanced Loudness technology provides powerful intensity even on compact speaker devices to create a massive amount of audio, allowing you to relish every sound. Dolby decoder technology also produces panoramic surround sound, which improves the TV's audio experience. You can easily explore the latest movies and TV series from all of your subscriptions by using the Google TV function built into this TV, ensuring that you never run out of entertainment options. Finding your next favourite is also made convenient by recommendations based on what you've watched and what interests you. With iFFALCON TV's intelligent voice control capability, you can choose the channel, watch your favourite programmes, and even get simple questions answered. You can enjoy movie theatre-quality sound in your living room thanks to eARC, which facilitates the TV audio coming from cable, satellite, streaming, or source devices to be transmitted to an AVR or sound bar through a single HDMI cable. This enables an engaging multi-dimensional encounter and augmented detail and intensity. You can feel all the actions as though they were taking place right in front of you thanks to the 3-sided, frameless design of this TV that facilitates a wide real estate for the screen and enhances your visual experience.

Have constant fun and bid adieu to all your dull moments with this Google TV, where you will not just explore the internet at ease but will also binge-watch your favourite shows and movies without any lag. This Motorola TV is sleek and comes with 2 GB RAM and 16 GB ROM. It has a Mediatek quad-core processor that brings seamless navigation, lets you multitask, and offers ample storage space for all your content. The built-in graphics in this TV will further enhance your TV-viewing experience. With the availability of a built-in Chromecast, you can easily cast your favourite movies, shows, etc., from your phone to your TV and enjoy watching them on the big screen.

Description: Set your stage for the ultimate viewing experience with the availability of 6 picture modes. This TV offers a crystal-clear display and has 1.07 billion vibrant colors that provide lifelike images. With a wide 178-degree viewing angle, you will enjoy your television time to the fullest. Enjoy your TV time with loud and clear audio powered by Dolby technology and have an immersive experience. The 24-watt speakers are very powerful and produce thunderous sound. The 4 sound modes, along with the 3D audio, will take you beyond the screen. Have constant fun and bid adieu to all your dull moments with this Google TV, where you will not just explore the internet at ease but will also binge-watch your favourite shows and movies without any lag. This Motorola TV is sleek and comes with 2 GB RAM and 16 GB ROM. It has a Mediatek quad-core processor that brings seamless navigation, lets you multitask, and offers ample storage space for all your content. The built-in graphics in this TV will further enhance your TV-viewing experience. With the availability of a built-in Chromecast, you can easily cast your favourite movies, shows, etc., from your phone to your TV and enjoy watching them on the big screen.
Review: Very nice product and good picture quality👍👍

Description: The Quantum Dot Colour featured in this Hisense TV enhances your visual quality by delivering every colour with maximum accuracy. You can see the colours in their true glory and produces realistic visuals, so you can see the light and dark colours precisely. This TV enables you to view every content in 4K quality using the AI upscaler. It analyses each frame to adjust the pixels to produce 4K images, so you can watch all your favourite content in premium video quality. This TV comes with LED lights on the back panel to produce accurate brightness, contrast, and detailing, and to deliver vivid colours. The Direct Full Array grid elevates the overall output delivered through this TV using the LED lights. This TV comes with a wide range of HDR formats for you to choose from including Dolby Vision, HDR10+, and more. You can watch all types of content in the format you desire with utmost detailing and precision. You can listen to immersive audio with the Dolby Atmos featured on this TV. It provides you with surround sound, allowing you to watch your favourite movies, shows, sports, listen to music, and much more in the way you desire. You need not miss a single audio detail as the Dolby Atmos has got you covered. You can have a three-dimensional display on this TV, thanks to the AI Adaptive Depth technology featured in this TV. It analyses every scene to adjust the clarity and contrast by up to 256 layers by differentiating between foreground, midground, and background elements. This way, you can elevate your viewing experience with this TV. The Hisense Filmmaker Mode allows you to adjust the sound, aspect ratio, colour, frame rate, and more to watch the video in its original state, the way the director created it. The Hinsense Pixel Tuning makes use of Global/Micro Dimming and Noise Reduction technologies to analyse each frame to elevate your viewing experience. These technologies enhance each pixel to produce a visual masterpiece. Courtesy of the Game Mode Plus featured in this TV, you have a smooth gameplay experience. It has a fast refresh rate of 60 Hz and a low latency MEMC to provide you with seamless graphics and display. You can enhance your gaming sessions with smooth and lag-free gameplay. You can replace the boring sports viewing ways with the AI Sports Mode. It provides you with maximum immersion, so you feel like you are sitting in a stadium watching your favourite sport. The AI Sports Mode delivers crystal-clear audio, utmost picture clarity, and detail, so you never miss anything. The Hisense Smooth Motion technology eliminates the blurs with the help of MEMC and 3D Noise Reduction on the 60 Hz panel of this TV, so you can enjoy crystal clear visuals every time. The Hisense Voice Remote is a true game changer as it offers easy operations of this TV. You can give voice commands using this remote control to get access to your desired content, thanks to the built-in microphone featured in it. This TV allows you to mirror the screen from your smartphone, tablet, and more to it, to view content on the big screen. The Share-to-TV function of this TV supports DLNA, Miracast, Chromecast, Airplay, and more for you to choose from based on your needs. This Hisense TV comes with Bluetooth that allows you to connect your headphones to it. This way, you can enjoy listening to your favourite music, and watching movies and shows without disturbing others. The Google Home feature of this smart TV offers seamless set-up and control from anywhere. You can stream content from your Apple devices by connecting them to this TV using Apple AirPlay to elevate your viewing experience. The Apple Home feature enables you to easily control your Apple devices using the Apple Homekit technology.
Review: Good TV but it is a VA panel so the viewing angles are not that great. Even 40 degrees right or left from the center will distort the colours.

Review: This TV is superb, if you're buying it for Movies.But IT'S NOT BUILT FOR GAMING!!Don't buy this TV for PLAYSTATION. It's have ghosting issues.This TV does not have any HDMI 2.1 and 120hz only works on 1080. HDR will not support in 4k. It works only in 1080.Lastly, this TV is not QLED, it's ULED.

Specification: In The Box : Television:1N, Remote:1N, Table Stand:2N, Warranty Card:1N, Manual:1N, Batteries:2N Model Name : 43E68N Display Size : 108 cm (43 inch) Screen Type : QLED HD Technology & Resolution : Ultra HD (4K), 3840 x 2160 Series : E68N Smart Tv : Yes HDMI : 3 USB : 2 Built In Wi-Fi : Yes Launch Year : 2024 Wall Mount Included : No Picture Engine : Hi-View Engine View Angle : 178 Degree Digital Noise Filter : Yes LED Display Type : DLED Aspect Ratio : 16:09 Refresh Rate : 60 Hz Number of Speakers : 2 Speaker Output RMS : 24 W Sound Mode : Standard,Theatre,Sports,Music,Speech,Late Night Ram Capacity : 2 GB Storage Memory : 16 GB Supported App - Netflix : Yes Supported App - Youtube : Yes Supported App - Disney+Hotstar : Yes Supported App - Prime Video : Yes Supported Mobile Operating System : Android, iOS Operating System : Google TV Screen Mirroring : Yes Bluetooth : Yes Teletext : Yes Built In Wi-Fi : Yes Ethernet (RJ45) : 1 HDMI : 3 Side USB : 2 Side Smart Remote : Yes RF Capable : Yes Other Remote Control Features : Direct APP Hotkey, Remote Voice Control Power Requirement : AC 100 - 240 V Power Consumption : 95 W, 0.5 W (Standby) Sleep Timer : Yes Child Lock : Yes Parental Control : Yes Width x Height x Depth (without stand) : 963 mm x 566 mm x 74 mm Weight (without stand) : 7.3 KG Width x Height x Depth (with stand) : 963 mm x 614 mm x 238 mm Weight (with stand) : 7.4 KG Warranty Summary : 2 Years Comprehensive Warranty Covered in Warranty : All Manufacturing Defects Not Covered in Warranty : Warranty Does Not Cover Any External Accessories (Such as Battery, Cable, Carrying Bag), Damage Caused to the Product Due to Improper Installation by Customer, Normal Wear and Tear and Damages Caused to the Product by Accident, Lightening, Ingress of Water, Fire, Dropping or Excessive Shock, Any Damage Caused Due to Tampering of the Product by an Unauthorized Agent. Warranty Service Type : In case product required repair service then customer has to contact call center and technician will visit at customer site. If product is in warranty then technician will offer FOC service. If product is physical damage by customer mishandling then also same process but warranty service change to out of warranty Installation & Demo Details : We'll facilitate the installation and demo through authorized service engineer at your convenience The installation will be done within 48 hours of delivery of the TV. The service engineer will install your new TV, either on wall mount or on table top. Installation and demo are provided free of cost. The engineer will also help you understand your new TV's features. The process generally covers:Wall-mounted or table-top installation, as requested. Physical check of all ports, including power and USB ports. Accessories also checked. Demonstration of features and settings Quick run-through on how to operate the TV. Extra charges for wall mount is Rs 399 for 32 to 43 inch TV, 499 for 50 to 55 TV and 699 for 65 Above TV. GST 18% shall be appliable over & above.
Description: The Quantum Dot Colour featured in this Hisense TV enhances your visual quality by delivering every colour with maximum accuracy. You can see the colours in their true glory and produces realistic visuals, so you can see the light and dark colours precisely. This TV enables you to view every content in 4K quality using the AI upscaler. It analyses each frame to adjust the pixels to produce 4K images, so you can watch all your favourite content in premium video quality. This TV comes with LED lights on the back panel to produce accurate brightness, contrast, and detailing, and to deliver vivid colours. The Direct Full Array grid elevates the overall output delivered through this TV using the LED lights. This TV comes with a wide range of HDR formats for you to choose from including Dolby Vision, HDR10+, and more. You can watch all types of content in the format you desire with utmost detailing and precision. You can listen to immersive audio with the Dolby Atmos featured on this TV. It provides you with surround sound, allowing you to watch your favourite movies, shows, sports, listen to music, and much more in the way you desire. You need not miss a single audio detail as the Dolby Atmos has got you covered. You can have a three-dimensional display on this TV, thanks to the AI Adaptive Depth technology featured in this TV. It analyses every scene to adjust the clarity and contrast by up to 256 layers by differentiating between foreground, midground, and background elements. This way, you can elevate your viewing experience with this TV. The Hisense Filmmaker Mode allows you to adjust the sound, aspect ratio, colour, frame rate, and more to watch the video in its original state, the way the director created it. The Hinsense Pixel Tuning makes use of Global/Micro Dimming and Noise Reduction technologies to analyse each frame to elevate your viewing experience. These technologies enhance each pixel to produce a visual masterpiece. Courtesy of the Game Mode Plus featured in this TV, you have a smooth gameplay experience. It has a fast refresh rate of 60 Hz and a low latency MEMC to provide you with seamless graphics and display. You can enhance your gaming sessions with smooth and lag-free gameplay. You can replace the boring sports viewing ways with the AI Sports Mode. It provides you with maximum immersion, so you feel like you are sitting in a stadium watching your favourite sport. The AI Sports Mode delivers crystal-clear audio, utmost picture clarity, and detail, so you never miss anything. The Hisense Smooth Motion technology eliminates the blurs with the help of MEMC and 3D Noise Reduction on the 60 Hz panel of this TV, so you can enjoy crystal clear visuals every time. The Hisense Voice Remote is a true game changer as it offers easy operations of this TV. You can give voice commands using this remote control to get access to your desired content, thanks to the built-in microphone featured in it. This TV allows you to mirror the screen from your smartphone, tablet, and more to it, to view content on the big screen. The Share-to-TV function of this TV supports DLNA, Miracast, Chromecast, Airplay, and more for you to choose from based on your needs. This Hisense TV comes with Bluetooth that allows you to connect your headphones to it. This way, you can enjoy listening to your favourite music, and watching movies and shows without disturbing others. The Google Home feature of this smart TV offers seamless set-up and control from anywhere. You can stream content from your Apple devices by connecting them to this TV using Apple AirPlay to elevate your viewing experience. The Apple Home feature enables you to easily control your Apple devices using the Apple Homekit technology.

Review: Amazing product. After long research I chose this. My selection did not fail. I love the picture quality and am not satisfied with the sound quality. Needs improvement on this. Software response is good. But sometimes it lags. QLED displays dark dots well. We can easily switch between different windows. Overall I am satisfied with this peoduct

Review: Picture quality is Awesome, thanks for the quantum dot display. We can easily identify the difference between UHD and this QLED, I would say it was a great experience. Cons: Very Very laggy software, google TV is very slow. I hope the next update will resolve this issue.

The Hisense Voice Remote is a true game changer as it offers easy operations of this TV. You can give voice commands using this remote control to get access to your desired content, thanks to the built-in microphone featured in it. This TV allows you to mirror the screen from your smartphone, tablet, and more to it, to view content on the big screen. The Share-to-TV function of this TV supports DLNA, Miracast, Chromecast, Airplay, and more for you to choose from based on your needs. This Hisense TV comes with Bluetooth that allows you to connect your headphones to it. This way, you can enjoy listening to your favourite music, and watching movies and shows without disturbing others. The Google Home feature of this smart TV offers seamless set-up and control from anywhere. You can stream content from your Apple devices by connecting them to this TV using Apple AirPlay to elevate your viewing experience. The Apple Home feature enables you to easily control your Apple devices using the Apple Homekit technology.
Review: Value for money.

This TV enables you to view every content in 4K quality using the AI upscaler. It analyses each frame to adjust the pixels to produce 4K images, so you can watch all your favourite content in premium video quality. This TV comes with LED lights on the back panel to produce accurate brightness, contrast, and detailing, and to deliver vivid colours. The Direct Full Array grid elevates the overall output delivered through this TV using the LED lights. This TV comes with a wide range of HDR formats for you to choose from including Dolby Vision, HDR10+, and more. You can watch all types of content in the format you desire with utmost detailing and precision. You can listen to immersive audio with the Dolby Atmos featured on this TV. It provides you with surround sound, allowing you to watch your favourite movies, shows, sports, listen to music, and much more in the way you desire. You need not miss a single audio detail as the Dolby Atmos has got you covered. You can have a three-dimensional display on this TV, thanks to the AI Adaptive Depth technology featured in this TV. It analyses every scene to adjust the clarity and contrast by up to 256 layers by differentiating between foreground, midground, and background elements. This way, you can elevate your viewing experience with this TV. The Hisense Filmmaker Mode allows you to adjust the sound, aspect ratio, colour, frame rate, and more to watch the video in its original state, the way the director created it. The Hinsense Pixel Tuning makes use of Global/Micro Dimming and Noise Reduction technologies to analyse each frame to elevate your viewing experience. These technologies enhance each pixel to produce a visual masterpiece. Courtesy of the Game Mode Plus featured in this TV, you have a smooth gameplay experience. It has a fast refresh rate of 60 Hz and a low latency MEMC to provide you with seamless graphics and display. You can enhance your gaming sessions with smooth and lag-free gameplay. You can replace the boring sports viewing ways with the AI Sports Mode. It provides you with maximum immersion, so you feel like you are sitting in a stadium watching your favourite sport. The AI Sports Mode delivers crystal-clear audio, utmost picture clarity, and detail, so you never miss anything.
