Description: Say hello to a whole new way of experiencing entertainment with Thomson Google TV. Instantly dive into the vast universe of Google entertainment and explore a world of movies, TV series, cartoons, and sports that's perfect for family gatherings. Google Play Movies & more await your command, offering access to an impressive library of over 700,000 movies and TV episodes from a plethora of streaming applications tailored to your preferences. Whether you're a cinephile or a sports enthusiast, Thomson Google TV has something for everyone. Prepare to be captivated by the Quantum LED (QLED) revolution brought to life by Thomson Google TV. With an astonishing 1.1 billion Quantum Dot nanocrystals filtering your visuals, your TV experience reaches unparalleled heights. These Quantum Dots infuse every image with vibrant, true-to-life colours, resulting in an industry-leading 95%+ colour gamut and enhanced brightness. Witness a world of visuals that leap off the screen and immerse you in their brilliance. Thomson Google TV doesn't stop at Quantum LED; it's also equipped with Dolby Vision, HDR10, and HLG technology to elevate your visual experience. These incredible technologies work in harmony to enhance overall brightness and sharpness, ensuring that every frame is a feast for the eyes. With the ability to produce 100% colour volume and improve contrast, Thomson Google TV delivers the perfect colour tones, making every scene come to life. Get ready for a viewing experience like never before with Dolby Vision-Atmos. It's not just about seeing; it's about feeling. Dolby Vision expands the spectrum of colour, contrast, and brightness, bringing a wider array of visual nuances to your screen. Paired with HDR 10+ technology that dynamically adapts content on the fly, you'll witness jaw-dropping contrast and colour gamut, ensuring that every scene is presented in its best possible form. Thomson Google TV isn't just about stunning visuals; it's also a gateway to immersive audio. The Dolby Atmos audio system ensures that you don't just hear sound; you feel it. It's like having a cinema-quality sound experience right in your living room. With crisp high-definition surround sound that allows you to pinpoint objects moving across the screen, you'll groove to every beat and immerse yourself in the world of entertainment like never before. Connectivity is key in the modern world, and Thomson Google TV excels in this department. It supports iOS, Windows, and Android, allowing you to effortlessly cast your favourite videos from your phone, tablet, or laptop onto the big screen. Bluetooth 5.0 connectivity ensures that all your compatible devices sync seamlessly with your Google TV, unlocking a world of entertainment possibilities. Thomson Google TV doesn't just deliver on performance; it's a work of art. With its sleek, bezel-less design, it seamlessly integrates into any room, whether it's in the living room or bedroom. The vivid display and an impressive 96% screen-to-body ratio provide a viewing experience that's nothing short of awe-inspiring. Your TV becomes a statement piece, enhancing the decor of your home. Entertainment knows no bounds with Thomson Google TV. Gain access to a treasure trove of over 10,000 content offerings, including movies, TV programs, sports, music, and live shows, courtesy of major local providers like YouTube, Netflix, Prime Video, ErosNow, ZEE5, Disney+Hotstar, Voot, Jio Cinema, Hungama Play, ALTBalaji, and YuppTV. Plus, there's a plethora of material from YuppTv, ALTBalaji, and Hungama Play, ensuring that there's always something to cater to your every mood and whim. Behind the magic of Thomson Google TV lies a supercharged MediaTek processor, ensuring that every operation is seamless and responsive. This processor utilises a sophisticated algorithm that analyses information in real-time, optimising images to deliver lifelike, breathtaking visuals that leave you spellbound. Say goodbye to latency and hello to a world of fluid entertainment.
Review: Sound is good but not excellent. Just connect it with a sound bar, u will see it's full potential. No words for picture quality. It can give a tough competition for sony and samsung due to its QLED technology.Just jaw dropping viewing experience.Viewing angle and anti-glare screen is mind blowing.It can even play  8k video without any frame drops. A must buy product and you won't regret. I don't think sound is an issue. There are a lot of sound devices available in the market. Just plug, play...

Description: This QLED TV brings every colour to life in its true beauty with its wide range of colours up to 90% according to the DCI-P3 standard. You can experience your favourite characters with utmost clarity on this TV. You can comfortably watch your favourite movies at home as the Dolby Vision ensure a theatre-like movie experience with its visual quality. You can watch intense scenes without a glitch on this TV, thanks to Dolby Vision featured in it. The High Dynamic Range (HDR) ensures bringing in brightness, shadow detail, and vivid colours to enhance your visual experience. You can view the stunning colours with exceptional detailing with the HDR10+ technology. You can view this TV clearly even when the bright sun shines into the room, without having any glare or shadow which can hinder your entertainment time. With MEMC you can watch smooth and flawless visuals, as it increases the frame rate to reduce motion blur and image tearing. You can enhance your gaming experience with Gaming in Dolby Vision, as it offers exceptional detailing and allows you to explore the depth of the game. You can enjoy intense gaming sessions on this TV with your friends and family. The iFFALCON Game Master has a lot to offer to elevate your gaming experience with its advanced technology. You can have a smooth and seamless gaming session with the help of the Game Master. You can monitor your gaming sessions with the game bar by checking up on the screen and game parameters so that you can stay ahead of the game. This TV automatically switches to Automatic Low Latency Mode when you are gaming to ensure a quick and smooth response. The Dolby Atmos audio system offers an immersive audio experience so that you can listen to dialogues, songs, and much more with precision. It delivers a three-dimensional audio experience to enable you to theatre-like audio. Review: Bought iffalcon Q73 55 inches Tv on BBD sale under 30k.Delivered in two days and installation is done after the next day of delivery .1.Pricing is best in this segment 2.exellent picture Quality and colour inhancment 3. 56w sound System is highly commendable,only 50% volume is more than enough.4.build Quality is good at this price range 5.There is no connectivity problem have been seen till now  6.watching experience is best so far.Yk.

Description: This QLED TV brings every colour to life in its true beauty with its wide range of colours up to 90% according to the DCI-P3 standard. You can experience your favourite characters with utmost clarity on this TV. You can comfortably watch your favourite movies at home as the Dolby Vision ensure a theatre-like movie experience with its visual quality. You can watch intense scenes without a glitch on this TV, thanks to Dolby Vision featured in it. The High Dynamic Range (HDR) ensures bringing in brightness, shadow detail, and vivid colours to enhance your visual experience. You can view the stunning colours with exceptional detailing with the HDR10+ technology. You can view this TV clearly even when the bright sun shines into the room, without having any glare or shadow which can hinder your entertainment time. With MEMC you can watch smooth and flawless visuals, as it increases the frame rate to reduce motion blur and image tearing. You can enhance your gaming experience with Gaming in Dolby Vision, as it offers exceptional detailing and allows you to explore the depth of the game. You can enjoy intense gaming sessions on this TV with your friends and family. The iFFALCON Game Master has a lot to offer to elevate your gaming experience with its advanced technology. You can have a smooth and seamless gaming session with the help of the Game Master. You can monitor your gaming sessions with the game bar by checking up on the screen and game parameters so that you can stay ahead of the game. This TV automatically switches to Automatic Low Latency Mode when you are gaming to ensure a quick and smooth response. The Dolby Atmos audio system offers an immersive audio experience so that you can listen to dialogues, songs, and much more with precision. It delivers a three-dimensional audio experience to enable you to theatre-like audio. The DTS Virtual:X enables surround sound which feel like the sound is emerging from above, behind, and beside you for an immersive experience. You can access unlimited entertainment with Google TV as it brings in numerous streaming platforms. It offers a more personalised viewing experience by offering content suggestions based on your viewing history and preferences. Thanks to the built-in voice assistant, you can simply use your voice to give commands. You can ask Google for weather updates, sports scores, news updates, and much more. You can easily cast your smartphone or tablet screen to this TV using the Low Latency Casting. It offers a quick and seamless casting so that you can view your content in high quality on a big screen. You can continue browsing on your phone or tablet without any interruptions while casting the screen. This iFFALCON Q73 TV has a sleek and bezel-less design which enhances your viewing experience. It perfectly syncs with your decor and adds to the aesthetics of your home. You can connect this TV to other devices for more immersive gaming and entertainment. It features HDMI 2.1 and ALLM to have low latency and high-quality picture settings while gaming.
Review: Best QLED in this 30k with Google TV. Picture and sound quality is good No over saturation. Can edit picture settings in all modes. Definitely must buy.

Covered Under Standard Installation - Table Mounting Using Standard Stand Supplied as Accessory with TV - Extra Charges are Applicable for Wall Mounts as, Rs. 399 for 32 inch Display Size and Rs. 499 for >32 inch Display Size - Connecting with Available Power Source (within 1 Meter) - Connecting / Setting Up Various Available Input Source for Audio Video Based on Model - Connecting with Available WiFi (for Smart TV) - Checking TV for Proper Functioning - Demonstration of the TV and its Features"
Description: The metal bezel-free frame is expertly built and provides an immersive content viewing experience. Enjoy breathtaking clarity and razor-sharp 4K HDR picture quality, which makes entertainment a visual treat. Pictures come to live with our proprietary engine which tunes colour, contrast, and depth to precision. Whether you're watching your favorite movie or sharing your screen with a group of friends, our 178-degree viewing angle ensures that everyone has the best seat in the house. Get right in the middle of the action with crystal clear audio and deep bass. Experience a new dimension of sound that will transport you to the middle of a live concert or a movie theater. With Fire TV built-in, live TV and your favourite streaming apps come together on one easy-to-use home screen, so you can quickly choose what you want to watch. With Fire TV built in, you can personalize your family’s viewing experience with up to six profiles, so everyone can have their own watch list, recommendations, and live TV preferences. With Fire TV built-in, stream more than a million movies and TV show episodes across 12,000+ apps including Prime Video, Netflix, and more (subscription may be required). Plus stream for free with miniTV, MX Player, and more. Now you can switch between DTH TV channels and OTT apps seamlessly by just asking Alexa. With the Live tab and On Now row, you can easily access TV serials, live news or browse the channel guide, all in one place. The included Voice Remote with Alexa lets you use your voice to easily change channels, launch apps, search for titles, play music, and even control smart home devices through your Smart Home Dashboard. Easy control, Voice search, Dedicated app buttons, and more with a new ergonomic design remote. Experience lightning-fast processing speeds and seamless multitasking with our powerful processor and fast storage. Stay connected and enjoy the newer connectivity standards. Connect to all the devices with ease.
Review: The picture looks pixelated and blurry when SD and 720p channels are played, sometimes. For HD it works good. Sound is amazing. The software has a lot of bugs. Do not pair your dth with tv remote. If you do, the remote starts malfunctioning for original tv controls and there is no option to revert the settings. I had to factory reset the tv. I would say get it if it's below 10k, but add a little more and get a good processor and ram, it matters too much, I didn't know earlier.

Description: The metal bezel-free frame is expertly built and provides an immersive content viewing experience. Enjoy breathtaking clarity and razor-sharp 4K HDR picture quality, which makes entertainment a visual treat. Pictures come to live with our proprietary engine which tunes colour, contrast, and depth to precision. Whether you're watching your favorite movie or sharing your screen with a group of friends, our 178-degree viewing angle ensures that everyone has the best seat in the house. Get right in the middle of the action with crystal clear audio and deep bass. Experience a new dimension of sound that will transport you to the middle of a live concert or a movie theater. With Fire TV built-in, live TV and your favourite streaming apps come together on one easy-to-use home screen, so you can quickly choose what you want to watch. With Fire TV built in, you can personalize your family’s viewing experience with up to six profiles, so everyone can have their own watch list, recommendations, and live TV preferences. With Fire TV built-in, stream more than a million movies and TV show episodes across 12,000+ apps including Prime Video, Netflix, and more (subscription may be required). Plus stream for free with miniTV, MX Player, and more. Now you can switch between DTH TV channels and OTT apps seamlessly by just asking Alexa. With the Live tab and On Now row, you can easily access TV serials, live news or browse the channel guide, all in one place. The included Voice Remote with Alexa lets you use your voice to easily change channels, launch apps, search for titles, play music, and even control smart home devices through your Smart Home Dashboard. Easy control, Voice search, Dedicated app buttons, and more with a new ergonomic design remote. Experience lightning-fast processing speeds and seamless multitasking with our powerful processor and fast storage. Stay connected and enjoy the newer connectivity standards. Connect to all the devices with ease.

Description: The heart of this extraordinary television lies in its Quantum Picture Quality. Powered by QLED Technology, it boasts a stunning palette of over one billion colours, ensuring every scene is a true work of art. Whether you're watching a thrilling action movie or a serene nature documentary, you'll be transported into the heart of the action with colours that are closer to reality than ever before. With over 16 million colours at your disposal, the Acer V Series TV paints your world with true-to-life shades, ensuring that every detail is vividly and authentically represented. You'll experience a wide colour gamut that breathes life into your content, making it a visual feast for your eyes. The immersive experience doesn't stop with the visuals. The Acer V Series TV is equipped with Dolby Audio technology, turning your living room into a cinematic soundscape. The high-fidelity 30 W speakers deliver rich and crystal-clear sound at every frequency, ensuring that dialogue is crisp, music is melodic, and action sequences are pulse-pounding. You'll enjoy audio selections in their truest form, making every moment an audio-visual spectacle. Say goodbye to the hassle of navigating through multiple streaming apps. With Google TV, your favourite content is just a click away. Access a vast library of over 10,000 apps and enjoy content personalised just for you. The personalised entertainment experience extends to personal profiles, allowing you to discover new favourites with tailored recommendations. Plus, seamless casting lets you effortlessly share movies, shows, photos, and more from your phone or tablet directly to your TV. Whether it's movie night or a family slideshow, the Acer V Series TV has got you covered. In the era of remote work and virtual meetings, your TV can now double as your work and entertainment hub. The Acer V Series TV offers multiple casting and connectivity options across various platforms, ensuring you can effortlessly switch between tasks. With Dual-Band WiFi, HDMI 1.4, eARC, 2-Way Bluetooth 5.0, USB 2.0, and more, you'll never run out of options when it comes to enjoying your content or collaborating with colleagues. Beyond its impressive technology, the Acer V Series TV boasts a masterful design that complements any home decor. The sleek, minimal, and ultra-modern metal-finish frameless design enhances the aesthetics of your living space. It's not just a TV; it's a work of art that elevates the ambiance of your home. Prepare to be captivated by the smallest of details. With black-level augmentation, the Acer V Series TV delivers breathtaking contrast and higher brightness, resulting in darker blacks and brighter whites. This means you'll witness every nuance and subtlety in your content, whether it's the dimly lit streets of a thriller or the brilliance of a sunny day. Immerse yourself in the world of entertainment with the frameless masterpiece of the Acer V Series TV. The frameless design extends your viewing area, ensuring that you're enveloped in the visuals, free from any distractions. It's an experience that's richer, fuller, and more captivating than ever before.
Review: The overall product was good , especially the picture quality and sound quality are very good and some little bit lag/slow in user interface and software while we are switching on the tv it comes a little bit slow. I request the acer team to resolve this issue in the next software update. Thanks to the Filpkart team and the acer team.

Review: Edited on 15th May 2024 - UI is giving more issues now.  Regret my decision , should have opted for Mi TV instead. Acer V series 32inch Qled - Review after 2 months usagePros1. Nice picture and sound at this price range2. All apps are supported (Prime, Netflix, hotstar etc)3. design is ok. Bezel are not thick4. Colors are largely accurate.  Cons1. The biggest problem I have is Bluetooth headphones connectivity. Tried my Energy systems and boult headphones both have connectivity issu...

With over 16 million colours at your disposal, the Acer V Series TV paints your world with true-to-life shades, ensuring that every detail is vividly and authentically represented. You'll experience a wide colour gamut that breathes life into your content, making it a visual feast for your eyes. The immersive experience doesn't stop with the visuals. The Acer V Series TV is equipped with Dolby Audio technology, turning your living room into a cinematic soundscape. The high-fidelity 30 W speakers deliver rich and crystal-clear sound at every frequency, ensuring that dialogue is crisp, music is melodic, and action sequences are pulse-pounding. You'll enjoy audio selections in their truest form, making every moment an audio-visual spectacle. Say goodbye to the hassle of navigating through multiple streaming apps. With Google TV, your favourite content is just a click away. Access a vast library of over 10,000 apps and enjoy content personalised just for you. The personalised entertainment experience extends to personal profiles, allowing you to discover new favourites with tailored recommendations. Plus, seamless casting lets you effortlessly share movies, shows, photos, and more from your phone or tablet directly to your TV. Whether it's movie night or a family slideshow, the Acer V Series TV has got you covered. In the era of remote work and virtual meetings, your TV can now double as your work and entertainment hub. The Acer V Series TV offers multiple casting and connectivity options across various platforms, ensuring you can effortlessly switch between tasks. With Dual-Band WiFi, HDMI 1.4, eARC, 2-Way Bluetooth 5.0, USB 2.0, and more, you'll never run out of options when it comes to enjoying your content or collaborating with colleagues. Beyond its impressive technology, the Acer V Series TV boasts a masterful design that complements any home decor. The sleek, minimal, and ultra-modern metal-finish frameless design enhances the aesthetics of your living space. It's not just a TV; it's a work of art that elevates the ambiance of your home. Prepare to be captivated by the smallest of details. With black-level augmentation, the Acer V Series TV delivers breathtaking contrast and higher brightness, resulting in darker blacks and brighter whites. This means you'll witness every nuance and subtlety in your content, whether it's the dimly lit streets of a thriller or the brilliance of a sunny day. Immerse yourself in the world of entertainment with the frameless masterpiece of the Acer V Series TV. The frameless design extends your viewing area, ensuring that you're enveloped in the visuals, free from any distractions. It's an experience that's richer, fuller, and more captivating than ever before.

Description: The LG UHD TV with HDR10 Pro takes your visual experience to a whole new level. It brings optimised brightness levels, ensuring vibrant colours and remarkable details that will leave you in awe. Whether you're watching an action-packed movie or a nature documentary, every scene will be brought to life with stunning realism. Powered by the α5 AI Processor 4K Gen6, this TV delivers an immersive experience like no other. The advanced AI processing enhances the overall performance, providing you with sharp images, smooth motion, and lifelike colours. It intelligently analyses and optimises the content in real-time, ensuring that you enjoy the best possible picture quality. With AI Super Upscaling, you can now enjoy non-4K content in stunning 4K resolution. Even if you're watching your favourite show on a large UHD screen, this feature intelligently upscales the content, enhancing clarity and precision. Every detail is meticulously enhanced, ensuring that you don't miss a single moment of the action. The Dynamic Tone Mapping feature on the LG UR7500 applies the optimal tone curve for more natural HDR, contrast, and detail. It intelligently adjusts the brightness and contrast levels to bring out the subtle nuances in every scene. So whether you're watching a sunlit beach or a dimly lit room, you'll experience true-to-life visuals with depth and realism. Imagine transforming your living room into a personal cinema. With the LG UR7500 TV, that dream becomes a reality. Watch your favourite movies and shows in stunning 4K resolution, and immerse yourself in a viewing experience that rivals the ones in the cinema. Get ready to be transported into a world of cinematic wonders from the comfort of your own home. The AI Sound Pro feature creates the effect of 5.1 surround speakers, providing you with clarity and balance control. Whether it's a dialogue-heavy scene or an action-packed sequence, the audio will be crisp and immersive. Feel like you're in the center of the action as the sound surrounds you, elevating your viewing experience to new heights. The Filmmaker mode on the LG UR7500 TV preserves the director's cut, ensuring a more authentic way to enjoy your content. With this mode enabled, you can watch movies and TV shows exactly as the filmmakers intended. Experience the true vision and artistic intent behind every frame, bringing you closer to the cinematic masterpiece. Stream your favourite content straight from your TV with ease. The LG UR7500 TV provides seamless access to popular streaming services like Netflix, Disney+Hotstar, Prime Video, and Apple TV+. Enjoy a vast library of movies, TV shows, and documentaries, all at your fingertips. Indulge in a binge-watching session or discover new gems from around the world - the choice is yours. With WebOS Home, the LG UR7500 TV puts your favourite content in the spotlight. Customise your viewing experience and access your preferred apps, channels, and content with ease. The intuitive interface makes navigating through your entertainment options a breeze, ensuring that you spend more time enjoying your favourite shows and less time searching for them. Discover a whole new world of entertainment with My Profile. Get personalised recommendations based on your viewing preferences, all from one dedicated place. Whether it's movies, TV shows, or documentaries, the LG UR7500 TV will suggest content tailored to your tastes, helping you find your next binge-worthy obsession effortlessly. With Apple Airplay and Homekit, access information almost instantly. Connect your Apple devices seamlessly to your LG UR7500 TV and enjoy a seamless streaming experience. Use voice commands with the built-in smart assistant to control your TV and access a world of information and entertainment at your fingertips. Never miss a moment of your favourite team's action with the Sports Alert feature. Receive notifications and updates about your favourite teams, along with direct access to match schedules right from the home screen. Whether it's football, basketball, or any other sport, you'll always stay informed and ready to cheer on your team. With Quick Card, you can create dedicated cards for your favourite apps and services, just the way you like them. Arrange and organise your entertainment hub to suit your preferences. Have quick access to your go-to apps, streaming services, and more, making it easier than ever to jump right into your favourite content. Experience AAA gaming in all its glory with the LG UR7500 TV. It offers a faster, smoother, and more immersive gaming experience. Whether you're playing the latest titles or revisiting your favourite classics, the powerful processing capabilities and low input lag ensure you're always one step ahead. Immerse yourself in the world of gaming with stunning visuals and responsive gameplay. The Game Optimiser and Dashboard allow you to apply ideal settings for your game and check the refresh rate in real time. Fine-tune the picture and sound settings to suit your gaming preferences, ensuring that you get the most out of every gaming session. Stay in control and elevate your gaming experience to new heights. With HGiG (HDR Gaming Interest Group) support, you can enjoy the latest HDR games and immerse yourself in your gameplay. Experience vibrant colours, stunning contrast, and lifelike visuals that bring your games to life. Whether you're exploring vast virtual worlds or competing in intense multiplayer battles, the LG UR7500 TV enhances your gaming experience to a whole new level.

It runs buttery smooth.Also I tried it with HD channels on Airtel DTH. The quality of picture and audio is ex...

Description: With QLED technology, this TV is capable of displaying a breathtaking range of colours that can leave you mesmerised. With up to 90% coverage of the DCI-P3 colour standard, it's like stepping into a kaleidoscope and discovering a limitless world of vibrant hues and shades. Every scene comes to life with depth and richness that can captivate your senses. Experience cinema-like magic with Dolby Vision. As the curtains rise and the actors take the stage, you'll feel as though you're sitting in a theater rather than your living room. Dolby Vision brings scenes to life with unparalleled clarity, contrast, and colours, ensuring that every detail is preserved exactly as the filmmakers intended. Prepare to be spellbound by the lifelike visuals that transport you into another world. The iFFALCON Q73 Series is also equipped with HDR 10+, the latest standard for UHD content. With HDR, you'll enjoy striking brightness, exceptional shadow detail, and vivid colours that make every frame burst with life. Immerse yourself in the incredible picture details, as if you were right there on set with the actors. Even in the brightest of rooms, the high brightness of the Q73 Series ensures that you can enjoy clear pictures with vivid colours. Whether it's a sunny outdoor scene or a shadowy interior, you won't miss any of the intricate details. The TV's superior brightness technology brings out the hidden nuances in every frame, giving you a truly immersive viewing experience. Say goodbye to motion blur and image tearing with the MEMC algorithm. This advanced technology ensures a silky smooth scene by reducing display blur and guaranteeing seamless motion transitions. Whether you're watching a fast-paced action movie or playing your favorite video game, the MEMC algorithm keeps the visuals crisp and fluid. Speaking of gaming, the iFFALCON Q73 Series takes your gaming experience to the next level. With Gaming in Dolby Vision, you'll always see the best possible image, allowing you to discover every bit of detail and depth the game has to offer. The visuals are enhanced, bringing you closer to the action and immersing you in the gaming world like never before. Unleash your gaming potential with Game Master, iFFALCON's cutting-edge technology for gamers. Unlock advanced display and audio technologies that elevate your gaming experience to new heights. With smoother streaming and improved visuals, you'll have a competitive edge over your opponents. Say goodbye to frustrating latency with the 120 Hz Game Accelerator. This groundbreaking technology, powered by the DLG (Dual Line Gate), brings you an ultra-responsive TV with incredibly low latency. Every action you take will be reflected on the screen with lightning-fast speed, ensuring that you never miss a beat in your gaming sessions. Stay on top of your game with the Game Bar. Monitor your screen and game parameters, such as frame rate and HDR settings, all while playing. Quickly adjust and optimise your gaming experience without interrupting your gameplay. The Game Bar puts you in control, allowing you to make the most of your gaming sessions. For the competitive gamer, the ALLM (Automatic Low Latency Mode) ensures that you're always ahead of your enemies. When your game is on, the Q73 Series automatically switches to ALLM mode, guaranteeing unprecedented response accuracy. Say goodbye to input lag and enjoy a gaming experience like no other. The iFFALCON Q73 Series doesn't just excel in visuals—it also delivers incredible sound quality. Dolby Atmos transcends conventional channel limitations to bring you three-dimensional audio that fills the room. Experience astounding clarity, increased emotional impact, and immersive sound that seems to come from all directions. Prepare to be enveloped in a world of audio bliss. With DTS Virtual:X technology, the Q73 Series creates an enveloping sound that appears to emerge above, beside, and behind you. It provides an immersive audio experience that brings your favorite movies, shows, and games to life. Whether you're in a large living room or a cosy bedroom, DTS Virtual:X ensures that the audio quality is always exceptional. The iFFALCON Q73 Series comes with Google TV, a smart feature that opens up a world of entertainment possibilities. Discover new movies and shows from across your subscriptions and easily access content that interests you. With personalised suggestions based on your viewing history, finding your next favorite show has never been easier. Control your TV with ease using your voice. With the "Ok Google" feature, you can ask Google about the weather, sports scores, and more, and get instant answers right on your TV screen. Additionally, you can control your compatible smart home devices using your voice, creating a seamless and integrated smart home experience. Experience faster casting speeds with Low Latency Casting. Effortlessly cast high-quality videos and games from your laptop to your TV with 150% faster casting speeds. With just one tap, enjoy seamless casting and continue browsing on your phone or tablet while your content plays on the big screen. Say goodbye to long waiting times and enjoy instant entertainment. The iFFALCON Q73 Series features an edgeless design that adds a touch of elegance to any space. With its ultra-slim body, this TV seamlessly integrates into your living room, becoming a centerpiece that enhances the aesthetic appeal of your home. It's not just a TV; it's a piece of artwork that complements your lifestyle. For gamers, HDMI 2.1 is a crucial feature. The iFFALCON Q73 Series comes equipped with HDMI 2.1, providing the lowest latency and the best picture settings for gaming automatically. Experience the ultimate responsiveness and immerse yourself in a lag-free gaming experience like no other.

Review: Bought iffalcon Q73 55 inches Tv on BBD sale under 30k.Delivered in two days and installation is done after the next day of delivery .1.Pricing is best in this segment 2.exellent picture Quality and colour inhancment 3. 56w sound System is highly commendable,only 50% volume is more than enough.4.build Quality is good at this price range 5.There is no connectivity problem have been seen till now  6.watching experience is best so far.Yk.

Every scene comes to life with depth and richness that can captivate your senses. Experience cinema-like magic with Dolby Vision. As the curtains rise and the actors take the stage, you'll feel as though you're sitting in a theater rather than your living room. Dolby Vision brings scenes to life with unparalleled clarity, contrast, and colours, ensuring that every detail is preserved exactly as the filmmakers intended. Prepare to be spellbound by the lifelike visuals that transport you into another world. The iFFALCON Q73 Series is also equipped with HDR 10+, the latest standard for UHD content. With HDR, you'll enjoy striking brightness, exceptional shadow detail, and vivid colours that make every frame burst with life. Immerse yourself in the incredible picture details, as if you were right there on set with the actors. Even in the brightest of rooms, the high brightness of the Q73 Series ensures that you can enjoy clear pictures with vivid colours. Whether it's a sunny outdoor scene or a shadowy interior, you won't miss any of the intricate details. The TV's superior brightness technology brings out the hidden nuances in every frame, giving you a truly immersive viewing experience. Say goodbye to motion blur and image tearing with the MEMC algorithm. This advanced technology ensures a silky smooth scene by reducing display blur and guaranteeing seamless motion transitions. Whether you're watching a fast-paced action movie or playing your favorite video game, the MEMC algorithm keeps the visuals crisp and fluid. Speaking of gaming, the iFFALCON Q73 Series takes your gaming experience to the next level. With Gaming in Dolby Vision, you'll always see the best possible image, allowing you to discover every bit of detail and depth the game has to offer. The visuals are enhanced, bringing you closer to the action and immersing you in the gaming world like never before. Unleash your gaming potential with Game Master, iFFALCON's cutting-edge technology for gamers. Unlock advanced display and audio technologies that elevate your gaming experience to new heights. With smoother streaming and improved visuals, you'll have a competitive edge over your opponents. Say goodbye to frustrating latency with the 120 Hz Game Accelerator. This groundbreaking technology, powered by the DLG (Dual Line Gate), brings you an ultra-responsive TV with incredibly low latency. Every action you take will be reflected on the screen with lightning-fast speed, ensuring that you never miss a beat in your gaming sessions. Stay on top of your game with the Game Bar. Monitor your screen and game parameters, such as frame rate and HDR settings, all while playing. Quickly adjust and optimise your gaming experience without interrupting your gameplay. The Game Bar puts you in control, allowing you to make the most of your gaming sessions. For the competitive gamer, the ALLM (Automatic Low Latency Mode) ensures that you're always ahead of your enemies. When your game is on, the Q73 Series automatically switches to ALLM mode, guaranteeing unprecedented response accuracy. Say goodbye to input lag and enjoy a gaming experience like no other. The iFFALCON Q73 Series doesn't just excel in visuals—it also delivers incredible sound quality. Dolby Atmos transcends conventional channel limitations to bring you three-dimensional audio that fills the room. Experience astounding clarity, increased emotional impact, and immersive sound that seems to come from all directions. Prepare to be enveloped in a world of audio bliss. With DTS Virtual:X technology, the Q73 Series creates an enveloping sound that appears to emerge above, beside, and behind you. It provides an immersive audio experience that brings your favorite movies, shows, and games to life. Whether you're in a large living room or a cosy bedroom, DTS Virtual:X ensures that the audio quality is always exceptional. The iFFALCON Q73 Series comes with Google TV, a smart feature that opens up a world of entertainment possibilities. Discover new movies and shows from across your subscriptions and easily access content that interests you. With personalised suggestions based on your viewing history, finding your next favorite show has never been easier. Control your TV with ease using your voice. With the "Ok Google" feature, you can ask Google about the weather, sports scores, and more, and get instant answers right on your TV screen. Additionally, you can control your compatible smart home devices using your voice, creating a seamless and integrated smart home experience. Experience faster casting speeds with Low Latency Casting. Effortlessly cast high-quality videos and games from your laptop to your TV with 150% faster casting speeds. With just one tap, enjoy seamless casting and continue browsing on your phone or tablet while your content plays on the big screen. Say goodbye to long waiting times and enjoy instant entertainment. The iFFALCON Q73 Series features an edgeless design that adds a touch of elegance to any space. With its ultra-slim body, this TV seamlessly integrates into your living room, becoming a centerpiece that enhances the aesthetic appeal of your home. It's not just a TV; it's a piece of artwork that complements your lifestyle. For gamers, HDMI 2.1 is a crucial feature. The iFFALCON Q73 Series comes equipped with HDMI 2.1, providing the lowest latency and the best picture settings for gaming automatically. Experience the ultimate responsiveness and immerse yourself in a lag-free gaming experience like no other.
Review: Picture quality is awesome and soundis very nice . Overall it's very good tv at this price.

Description: Imagine a TV that understands your taste in entertainment, curates your favourite shows and movies, and presents them to you effortlessly. With Google TV on the Blaupunkt, this dream becomes a reality. Say goodbye to the hassle of switching between multiple streaming platforms – Google TV collects and organises your preferred content, so you can dive straight into the action. Plus, it provides insightful reviews to help you make the perfect choice for your next binge-watching session. Prepare to be transported into the heart of every scene with the Blaupunkt Google TV's Dolby Atmos Audio System. This cutting-edge technology delivers immersive 3D audio that envelops you in a rich auditory experience. Whether you're watching a thrilling sports match or catching up on your favourite TV show, the crystal-clear sound, sharper dialogue, and intricate details will leave you in awe. The Blaupunkt Google TV takes your visual experience to new heights with Dolby Vision. Marvel at breathtaking imaging and vibrant, true-to-life colours. Dolby's expertise in enhancing visuals means every frame is a work of art, and every moment is a spectacle. Immerse yourself in a world of unparalleled image quality. Crafted by German audio engineering experts, the CyberSound Gen 2.0 surround sound system is pure auditory excellence. These finely tuned 60W stereo speakers create an audio sensation that transcends ordinary TV sound. Feel the music, hear the whispers, and experience sound as it was meant to be. Blaupunkt Google TV understands that your voice is your command. With the Google Assistant button on your remote, your TV becomes your obedient companion. Ask Google to find the latest blockbusters, recommend live shows, or even start a multiplayer game. And if you've connected it to your smart home devices, it can dim the lights, manage your tasks, and even show your calendar. For the little ones in your family, Blaupunkt Google TV offers a dedicated Kids Mode. Featuring vibrant colours and delightful illustrations, it's designed with young viewers in mind. You can create personalised profiles for your children, ensuring that they enjoy age-appropriate content and setting time limits for their screen time. With access to a vast library of over 10,000 titles, including movies, TV shows, sports, music, and live events, the Blaupunkt Google TV truly spoils you for choice. From YouTube to Netflix, Prime Video to Disney+Hotstar, and many more, all your favourite streaming services are just a click away. Dive into a world of entertainment like never before. Not only does the Blaupunkt Google TV deliver exceptional performance, but it also complements the aesthetics of any living room with its frame-less design. The bezel-less screen provides an uninterrupted viewing experience, allowing you to focus solely on the content. It's not just a TV; it's a piece of art. Ever experienced lag during fast-paced action scenes? Not with Blaupunkt Google TV. Thanks to Motion Estimation and Motion Compensation (MEMC) Technology, this TV adds extra frames to low-frame-rate videos, resulting in smoother, lag-free playback. Every detail, every movement, is crystal clear, ensuring an immersive viewing experience.
Review: Genuinely I don't believe electronics in other brands than top brands but this TV blown away my mind. Full satisfied and worth full buy.

Review: The TV was delivered yesterday. Since it was open box delivery, the delivery person opened the package and showed the contents. The Jeeves service guy installed the TV on the same day. Coming to the TV,1. Picture quality is great and that qled diff is clearly visible.2. Sound quality was superb, once i turned off Dolby Atmos. Need to check more on this. Sound output is really  good for a 15 * 15 room3. Hey Google is working well and responds to our commands. It can be turned off, but very ...

Description: Imagine a TV that understands your taste in entertainment, curates your favourite shows and movies, and presents them to you effortlessly. With Google TV on the Blaupunkt, this dream becomes a reality. Say goodbye to the hassle of switching between multiple streaming platforms – Google TV collects and organises your preferred content, so you can dive straight into the action. Plus, it provides insightful reviews to help you make the perfect choice for your next binge-watching session. Prepare to be transported into the heart of every scene with the Blaupunkt Google TV's Dolby Atmos Audio System. This cutting-edge technology delivers immersive 3D audio that envelops you in a rich auditory experience. Whether you're watching a thrilling sports match or catching up on your favourite TV show, the crystal-clear sound, sharper dialogue, and intricate details will leave you in awe. The Blaupunkt Google TV takes your visual experience to new heights with Dolby Vision. Marvel at breathtaking imaging and vibrant, true-to-life colours. Dolby's expertise in enhancing visuals means every frame is a work of art, and every moment is a spectacle. Immerse yourself in a world of unparalleled image quality. Crafted by German audio engineering experts, the CyberSound Gen 2.0 surround sound system is pure auditory excellence. These finely tuned 60W stereo speakers create an audio sensation that transcends ordinary TV sound. Feel the music, hear the whispers, and experience sound as it was meant to be. Blaupunkt Google TV understands that your voice is your command. With the Google Assistant button on your remote, your TV becomes your obedient companion. Ask Google to find the latest blockbusters, recommend live shows, or even start a multiplayer game. And if you've connected it to your smart home devices, it can dim the lights, manage your tasks, and even show your calendar. For the little ones in your family, Blaupunkt Google TV offers a dedicated Kids Mode. Featuring vibrant colours and delightful illustrations, it's designed with young viewers in mind. You can create personalised profiles for your children, ensuring that they enjoy age-appropriate content and setting time limits for their screen time. With access to a vast library of over 10,000 titles, including movies, TV shows, sports, music, and live events, the Blaupunkt Google TV truly spoils you for choice. From YouTube to Netflix, Prime Video to Disney+Hotstar, and many more, all your favourite streaming services are just a click away. Dive into a world of entertainment like never before. Not only does the Blaupunkt Google TV deliver exceptional performance, but it also complements the aesthetics of any living room with its frame-less design. The bezel-less screen provides an uninterrupted viewing experience, allowing you to focus solely on the content. It's not just a TV; it's a piece of art. Ever experienced lag during fast-paced action scenes? Not with Blaupunkt Google TV. Thanks to Motion Estimation and Motion Compensation (MEMC) Technology, this TV adds extra frames to low-frame-rate videos, resulting in smoother, lag-free playback. Every detail, every movement, is crystal clear, ensuring an immersive viewing experience.
Review: Awesome reallyI have taken 65 inch i have played 4k and 720p videos For all round i can give the rating as 5Qled with 64inch clarity awesome audio awesome with 60w Video motion is excellent

Review: Pros : - Picture quality amazing sharpness and brightness is super blacks are deep 5/5.- Sound quality is good but a little more bass would've made it perfect 4/5.- connectivity options are standard. Both usb ports are very close to each other type c or usb 3rd gen or higher could've been used 4/5.Cons : Interface: It has standard Google tv interface. It has got 2gb ram and 16gb internal memory but it is super laggy. It is so laggy that for example  when i press volume up/ down button i...

Description: Imagine a TV that understands your taste in entertainment, curates your favourite shows and movies, and presents them to you effortlessly. With Google TV on the Blaupunkt, this dream becomes a reality. Say goodbye to the hassle of switching between multiple streaming platforms – Google TV collects and organises your preferred content, so you can dive straight into the action. Plus, it provides insightful reviews to help you make the perfect choice for your next binge-watching session. Prepare to be transported into the heart of every scene with the Blaupunkt Google TV's Dolby Atmos Audio System. This cutting-edge technology delivers immersive 3D audio that envelops you in a rich auditory experience. Whether you're watching a thrilling sports match or catching up on your favourite TV show, the crystal-clear sound, sharper dialogue, and intricate details will leave you in awe. The Blaupunkt Google TV takes your visual experience to new heights with Dolby Vision. Marvel at breathtaking imaging and vibrant, true-to-life colours. Dolby's expertise in enhancing visuals means every frame is a work of art, and every moment is a spectacle. Immerse yourself in a world of unparalleled image quality. Crafted by German audio engineering experts, the CyberSound Gen 2.0 surround sound system is pure auditory excellence. These finely tuned 60W stereo speakers create an audio sensation that transcends ordinary TV sound. Feel the music, hear the whispers, and experience sound as it was meant to be. Blaupunkt Google TV understands that your voice is your command. With the Google Assistant button on your remote, your TV becomes your obedient companion. Ask Google to find the latest blockbusters, recommend live shows, or even start a multiplayer game. And if you've connected it to your smart home devices, it can dim the lights, manage your tasks, and even show your calendar. For the little ones in your family, Blaupunkt Google TV offers a dedicated Kids Mode. Featuring vibrant colours and delightful illustrations, it's designed with young viewers in mind. You can create personalised profiles for your children, ensuring that they enjoy age-appropriate content and setting time limits for their screen time. With access to a vast library of over 10,000 titles, including movies, TV shows, sports, music, and live events, the Blaupunkt Google TV truly spoils you for choice. From YouTube to Netflix, Prime Video to Disney+Hotstar, and many more, all your favourite streaming services are just a click away. Dive into a world of entertainment like never before. Not only does the Blaupunkt Google TV deliver exceptional performance, but it also complements the aesthetics of any living room with its frame-less design. The bezel-less screen provides an uninterrupted viewing experience, allowing you to focus solely on the content. It's not just a TV; it's a piece of art. Ever experienced lag during fast-paced action scenes? Not with Blaupunkt Google TV. Thanks to Motion Estimation and Motion Compensation (MEMC) Technology, this TV adds extra frames to low-frame-rate videos, resulting in smoother, lag-free playback. Every detail, every movement, is crystal clear, ensuring an immersive viewing experience.
Review: Ultimate experience..... sound Quality super......👌👌👌 Picture Quality 4k videos ultimate 👌👌 Connectivity best......

Description: Provides a superior viewing experience with striking brightness, exceptional shadow details, and vivid color. Sit still and enjoy picture details as intended by the filmmakers. A technology developed exclusively by TCL optimize color vibrancy automatically, providing a more vibrant, premium video experience. Using high-penetration screen display technology, the backlight efficiency, energy consumption and contrast is effectively improved. Additionally, the viewing angle is greater than 178°, making the front of the TV the optimal viewing position. The AiPQ processor is a powerful mind to process content with stable and high-quality 4K. Now it's time to enjoy an authentic movie night. Designed to put you in the middle of every scene – with crystal clarity, crisper dialogue, and great detail. From ball games, to your favorite TV series – entertainment has never sounded better. Enable Standard/Dynamic/Music/Movie/Voice/Game/Sports sound modes according to the choice & content. With a rich Google application ecosystem including search browsing entertainment & game all in one. Ok Google, as Google's voice assistant, can perform various operations through voice commands, such as searching information, playing music, setting reminders, etc., making your life more convenient. We share your concern for your children. Keep your kids safe from potentially harmful content. Bringing high-quality video calls to the big screen for a more immersive and enjoyable experience. Chromecast to stream content from Macs or laptops, ipads, phones on to the big screen, With TCL. You'll experience lowest latency and the best picture settings for gaming, automatically. A set of transfer solutions simultaneously helps you manage the data traffic. The big storage (16G ROM + 2G RAM) allows you to enjoy more wonderful content. With low blue light, natural light optimization and flicker less technology, V6B continues to protect your eye health. All you need to do is to enjoy movies and games. The metallic bezel-less design of V6B makes it possible to view content in full-screen.
Review: Good 👍

Description: Integrated with WebOS, the LG Smart LED TV lets you watch your favourite TV shows and movies on various platforms, such as Hotstar, Amazon Prime, Netflix, and more. Featuring a sophisticated image processor, this TV optimises colour for rich and natural-looking visuals. As a result, you can enjoy watching the actual colours of nature on your TV. Featuring Active HDR, this TV optimises every scene, offering fine details and vibrant colours. And, thanks to its multi-HDR format, which includes HDR10 and HLG, as well as LG's dynamic scene-by-scene adjustment technology, any video content on this TV can be enjoyed in excellent HDR quality. This TV's inbuilt speakers produce multi-dimensional sound from all sides, allowing you to enjoy the rich, immersive audio. Featuring Dolby Audio, this TV allows you to enjoy crisp, immersive theatre-like audio at home. With the user-friendly Home Dashboard, you can control all of your connected smart devices from a single large screen remotely. By using your TV as a dashboard, you can create your own daily routine. Equipped with four quick, precise processors, this TV reduces noise and enhances dynamic colour and contrast. Furthermore, this TV ensures that images that are low in resolution are enhanced and represented as clear and vibrant visuals. Featuring a thin bezel and attractive finish, this TV blends well with your home decor for an enhanced viewing experience. You can watch more content on the webOS using streaming platforms, like Netflix, Disney+, YouTube, and more. And, thanks to this TV's integrated voice control feature, you can use simple voice commands to manage your home appliances. Available with LG ThinQ, this TV offers an enhanced viewing experience. You can choose an inbuilt voice assistant to manage your TV with your voice or to search all of the OTT platforms for TV shows and movies recommendations. As this TV allows you to multitask seamlessly, you can conveniently browse the Internet while watching TV at the same time.
Review: Value for money

Description: Bring Smart entertainment home with lifelike colors, sharp contrasts, and finer details for an unparalleled visual experience. Enjoy Stunning Visuals, and an enchanting viewing experience every time. Enhances images by analysing, cleansing, and refining them, ensuring consistently beautiful results from any source. Experience greater vibrancy, enriching every hue to captivate your senses. Where every image pulses with the rhythm of movement, more a sharper & clearer picture. Sound, that makes every visual look more impactful for a lively viewing experience with open baffle speaker. The advanced technology sharpens sound focus, directing music precisely within the soundstage. Connect your Bluetooth headphones or earphones to BRAVIA for wireless entertainment and enjoy your favourite music and movie. Discover content across 700,000+ movies and TV episodes effortlessly with around 10,000+ applications. Talk directly to your remote using the built-in mic to command your TV to search for movies, play music, check sports scores, and much more. Get recommendations for entertaining content based on your search and what you like. Watchlist your favourite content on your phone and watch it later, on BRAVIA TV. Set timers, filters, bedtimes, and a custom home screen to control access to what your kids watch and their screen time. Withstand dust, humidity, lightning, and power surges, ensuring uninterrupted viewing pleasure for years ahead. Simply connect your Alexa-enabled devices and enjoy hands-free power, channel switching, volume adjustments, and much more. Chromecast lets you readily stream top-notch videos, games, and apps from your phone to your TV with a simple tap of the Cast button on your Android or iOS device. Send video and audio from your iPhone, iPad, or Mac to your TV. Enjoy content from apps like Apple TV and share photos with everyone in the room. Eco-friendly settings, convenience, and efficiency allow users to have effortless navigation.
Review: TV experience is very good, in terms of clarity, sound, user interface, and Sony's fast service. Flipkart delivery also fastOverall nice experience

Specification: In The Box : 1 TV,Warranty Card, AC, Adapter, AC Power Cord, Remote Control, User Manual - 1 unit Each, Batteries - 2 Units Model Name : K-43S20B Display Size : 108 cm (43 inch) Screen Type : LED HD Technology & Resolution : Ultra HD (4K), 3840 x 2160 Series : Bravia 2 Smart Tv : Yes HDMI : 3 USB : 1 Built In Wi-Fi : Yes Launch Year : 2024 Wall Mount Included : Yes View Angle : 178 Degree LED Display Type : LED Aspect Ratio : 16:09 Refresh Rate : 60 Hz Number of Speakers : 2 Speaker Output RMS : 20 W Supported App - Netflix : Yes Supported App - Youtube : Yes Supported App - Disney+Hotstar : Yes Supported App - Prime Video : Yes Operating System : Google TV Screen Mirroring : Yes Bluetooth : Yes Built In Wi-Fi : Yes HDMI : 3 Rear USB : 1 Side Power Requirement : AC 100 - 240 V, 50/60 Hz Power Consumption : 0.5 W (Standby) Width x Height x Depth (without stand) : 971 mm x 77 mm Warranty Summary : 1 Year Warranty Covered in Warranty : Manufacturing Defects Not Covered in Warranty : Physical Damages Warranty Service Type : Technician Visit Installation & Demo Details : We'll facilitate the installation and demo through authorized service engineer at your convenience The installation will be done within 48 hours of delivery of the TV.The service engineer will install your new TV, either on wall mount or on table top. Description: Bring Smart entertainment home with lifelike colors, sharp contrasts, and finer details for an unparalleled visual experience. Enjoy Stunning Visuals, and an enchanting viewing experience every time. Enhances images by analysing, cleansing, and refining them, ensuring consistently beautiful results from any source. Experience greater vibrancy, enriching every hue to captivate your senses. Where every image pulses with the rhythm of movement, more a sharper & clearer picture. Sound, that makes every visual look more impactful for a lively viewing experience with open baffle speaker. The advanced technology sharpens sound focus, directing music precisely within the soundstage. Connect your Bluetooth headphones or earphones to BRAVIA for wireless entertainment and enjoy your favourite music and movie. Discover content across 700,000+ movies and TV episodes effortlessly with around 10,000+ applications. Talk directly to your remote using the built-in mic to command your TV to search for movies, play music, check sports scores, and much more. Get recommendations for entertaining content based on your search and what you like. Watchlist your favourite content on your phone and watch it later, on BRAVIA TV. Set timers, filters, bedtimes, and a custom home screen to control access to what your kids watch and their screen time. Withstand dust, humidity, lightning, and power surges, ensuring uninterrupted viewing pleasure for years ahead. Simply connect your Alexa-enabled devices and enjoy hands-free power, channel switching, volume adjustments, and much more. Chromecast lets you readily stream top-notch videos, games, and apps from your phone to your TV with a simple tap of the Cast button on your Android or iOS device. Send video and audio from your iPhone, iPad, or Mac to your TV. Enjoy content from apps like Apple TV and share photos with everyone in the room. Eco-friendly settings, convenience, and efficiency allow users to have effortless navigation.
Review: Perfect TV for bedroom. MotionXR is amazing for watching action movie and sports. Google TV Software is excellent compared to competitors. Supports 5Ghz. Remote is compact and comfortable to use.

Review: Two reasons for purchasing this TV was 1. It is a SONY2. Latest Model just launched less than a month agoHowever, the picture quality is good not great. Sound is slightly muffled and as loud as a normal 40 inch TV. It is slightly disappointing that in a TV of this size the sound output is not proportionally increased and you may need to  add a sound Bar or Home Theatre Sound system for better experience. Although this TV checks all other points being a SONY, however, the Bravia 2 tag is...

Description: Motorola edge 50 fusion is designed to capture its best shots at night with advanced features. The 50 MP main camera uses a powerful Sony LYTIA LYT-700C sensor to capture moments ultrafast with low noise even in dark environments. Who thought Night photography could get faster, accurate and focused. An advanced all-pixel focus technology on the Motorola Edge 50 Fusion elevates night photography by making it 32x more focused. While the Ultra Pixel sensor captures more light with larger 2.0µm pixels, the OIS automatically smoothens involuntary hand motion to give you a shake free video experience. Its advanced sensor gives two amazing perspectives. The 120 degree ultra-wide-angle lens captures what your eyes see, fitting more of the scene in your frame than a standard lens. So go ultra-wide or zoom in. The Macro Vision lens brings you 4x closer to your subject, so you see the tiniest of details. The new Quad Pixel technology combines every four pixels into one for 4x better low-light sensitivity giving you brilliant results. Moreover, you can also capture videos in 4K resolution from all cameras front and back and never miss a detail. Go worry-free on your adventures with the Motorola edge IP68 underwater protection, engineered to withstand dust, dirt, and sand, along with submersion in 1.5 meters of freshwater for up to 30 minutes. Now, getting wet is just one less thing to worry about.  Worry free display usage with Smart Water Touch technology. Motorola edge 50 fusion comes with an impressive design language. The symmetrical curved inlays align perfectly with your hand’s natural contours. At the same time, the endless edge design gives the ultrathin, lightweight body a sleek, refined look. Available in Hot Pink vegan suede or a Marshmallow Blue vegan leather finish that gives it a soft, tactile feel with an added touch of luxury. And another version highlights the sophisticated PMMA finish in Forest Blue. This 6.67 inch Curved display makes your content viewing even more immerse as it gives you continuous view from edge to edge. Experience over a billion shades of true-to-life colour with improved brightness and contrast. Enjoy it all with a remarkably smooth 144 Hz refresh rate. See better, even when you're outside with 1600 nits peak brightness, and enjoy life-like content HDR10+ support. The Corning Gorilla Glass 5 Scratch-resistant screen protects your display from damage. While the symmetrical curved inlay makes it comfortable to hold, aligning perfectly with your hand’s natural contours. Even the camera housing blends seamlessly with symmetrically curved sides. Accelerate performance with the Snapdragon 7s Gen 2 processor, powering advanced photography features and intensive gaming—all with unbelievable battery efficiency. This phone comes with upto 12 GB of memory with RAM Boost upto additional 12 GB. Store upto 256 GB of photos, videos, and games without breaking a sweat and turn your unused storage into virtual RAM upto 12 GB whenever you need some extra speed using RAM Boost. There is also 8 GB RAM + 128 GB storage variant for more affordable price. Get 5000 mAh battery in this ultra thin design. Power your day in just 15 minutes with 68 W TurboPower fast charging support. Which means 30 hours of battery life for all the crazy things you want to explore. Binge-watch that new series, stay in touch with friends, and capture the world around you—day and night. Customise your smartphone with your personal touch with the Hello UI based on Latest Android 14 out of the box. Change the colour schemes, themes, and languages of your apps and get complete control over which apps can access your data. You can also make your Moto more intuitive, more personal and more secure with exclusive Moto features. Moto Secure protects your phone and keeps all the threats at bay. Additionally, you will receive guaranteed 3 years OS updates till Android 17 and 4 years of security updates.

Description: Motorola edge 50 fusion is designed to capture its best shots at night with advanced features. The 50 MP main camera uses a powerful Sony LYTIA LYT-700C sensor to capture moments ultrafast with low noise even in dark environments. Who thought Night photography could get faster, accurate and focused. An advanced all-pixel focus technology on the Motorola Edge 50 Fusion elevates night photography by making it 32x more focused. While the Ultra Pixel sensor captures more light with larger 2.0µm pixels, the OIS automatically smoothens involuntary hand motion to give you a shake free video experience. Its advanced sensor gives two amazing perspectives. The 120 degree ultra-wide-angle lens captures what your eyes see, fitting more of the scene in your frame than a standard lens. So go ultra-wide or zoom in. The Macro Vision lens brings you 4x closer to your subject, so you see the tiniest of details. The new Quad Pixel technology combines every four pixels into one for 4x better low-light sensitivity giving you brilliant results. Moreover, you can also capture videos in 4K resolution from all cameras front and back and never miss a detail. Go worry-free on your adventures with the Motorola edge IP68 underwater protection, engineered to withstand dust, dirt, and sand, along with submersion in 1.5 meters of freshwater for up to 30 minutes. Now, getting wet is just one less thing to worry about.  Worry free display usage with Smart Water Touch technology. Motorola edge 50 fusion comes with an impressive design language. The symmetrical curved inlays align perfectly with your hand’s natural contours. At the same time, the endless edge design gives the ultrathin, lightweight body a sleek, refined look. Available in Hot Pink vegan suede or a Marshmallow Blue vegan leather finish that gives it a soft, tactile feel with an added touch of luxury. And another version highlights the sophisticated PMMA finish in Forest Blue. This 6.67 inch Curved display makes your content viewing even more immerse as it gives you continuous view from edge to edge. Experience over a billion shades of true-to-life colour with improved brightness and contrast. Enjoy it all with a remarkably smooth 144 Hz refresh rate. See better, even when you're outside with 1600 nits peak brightness, and enjoy life-like content HDR10+ support. The Corning Gorilla Glass 5 Scratch-resistant screen protects your display from damage. While the symmetrical curved inlay makes it comfortable to hold, aligning perfectly with your hand’s natural contours. Even the camera housing blends seamlessly with symmetrically curved sides. Accelerate performance with the Snapdragon 7s Gen 2 processor, powering advanced photography features and intensive gaming—all with unbelievable battery efficiency. This phone comes with upto 12 GB of memory with RAM Boost upto additional 12 GB. Store upto 256 GB of photos, videos, and games without breaking a sweat and turn your unused storage into virtual RAM upto 12 GB whenever you need some extra speed using RAM Boost. There is also 8 GB RAM + 128 GB storage variant for more affordable price. Get 5000 mAh battery in this ultra thin design. Power your day in just 15 minutes with 68 W TurboPower fast charging support. Which means 30 hours of battery life for all the crazy things you want to explore. Description: Motorola edge 50 fusion is designed to capture its best shots at night with advanced features. The 50 MP main camera uses a powerful Sony LYTIA LYT-700C sensor to capture moments ultrafast with low noise even in dark environments. Who thought Night photography could get faster, accurate and focused. An advanced all-pixel focus technology on the Motorola Edge 50 Fusion elevates night photography by making it 32x more focused. While the Ultra Pixel sensor captures more light with larger 2.0µm pixels, the OIS automatically smoothens involuntary hand motion to give you a shake free video experience. Its advanced sensor gives two amazing perspectives. The 120 degree ultra-wide-angle lens captures what your eyes see, fitting more of the scene in your frame than a standard lens. So go ultra-wide or zoom in. The Macro Vision lens brings you 4x closer to your subject, so you see the tiniest of details. The new Quad Pixel technology combines every four pixels into one for 4x better low-light sensitivity giving you brilliant results. Moreover, you can also capture videos in 4K resolution from all cameras front and back and never miss a detail. Go worry-free on your adventures with the Motorola edge IP68 underwater protection, engineered to withstand dust, dirt, and sand, along with submersion in 1.5 meters of freshwater for up to 30 minutes. Now, getting wet is just one less thing to worry about.  Worry free display usage with Smart Water Touch technology. Motorola edge 50 fusion comes with an impressive design language. The symmetrical curved inlays align perfectly with your hand’s natural contours. At the same time, the endless edge design gives the ultrathin, lightweight body a sleek, refined look. Available in Hot Pink vegan suede or a Marshmallow Blue vegan leather finish that gives it a soft, tactile feel with an added touch of luxury. And another version highlights the sophisticated PMMA finish in Forest Blue. This 6.67 inch Curved display makes your content viewing even more immerse as it gives you continuous view from edge to edge. Experience over a billion shades of true-to-life colour with improved brightness and contrast. Enjoy it all with a remarkably smooth 144 Hz refresh rate. See better, even when you're outside with 1600 nits peak brightness, and enjoy life-like content HDR10+ support. The Corning Gorilla Glass 5 Scratch-resistant screen protects your display from damage. While the symmetrical curved inlay makes it comfortable to hold, aligning perfectly with your hand’s natural contours. Even the camera housing blends seamlessly with symmetrically curved sides. Accelerate performance with the Snapdragon 7s Gen 2 processor, powering advanced photography features and intensive gaming—all with unbelievable battery efficiency. This phone comes with upto 12 GB of memory with RAM Boost upto additional 12 GB. Store upto 256 GB of photos, videos, and games without breaking a sweat and turn your unused storage into virtual RAM upto 12 GB whenever you need some extra speed using RAM Boost. There is also 8 GB RAM + 128 GB storage variant for more affordable price. Get 5000 mAh battery in this ultra thin design. Power your day in just 15 minutes with 68 W TurboPower fast charging support. Which means 30 hours of battery life for all the crazy things you want to explore. Binge-watch that new series, stay in touch with friends, and capture the world around you—day and night. Customise your smartphone with your personal touch with the Hello UI based on Latest Android 14 out of the box. Change the colour schemes, themes, and languages of your apps and get complete control over which apps can access your data. You can also make your Moto more intuitive, more personal and more secure with exclusive Moto features. Moto Secure protects your phone and keeps all the threats at bay. Additionally, you will receive guaranteed 3 years OS updates till Android 17 and 4 years of security updates.
Review: Value for money

Description: The Redmi 13C takes your photography to new heights with its 50 MP AI Triple Camera. Immerse your images in a vintage vibe, courtesy of the 7 classic film filters. Every snapshot becomes a timeless masterpiece, capturing the essence of the moment in rich detail and artistic flair. Dive into a world of cinematic bliss with the 17.11 cm (6.74) display of the Redmi 13C. Whether you're gaming, streaming, or simply browsing, the immersive display ensures a visual treat. Redefine your entertainment experience as games come to life with smoothness, thanks to the 90 Hz refresh rate that sets the stage for dynamic and responsive gameplay. Experience seamless multitasking like never before, courtesy of the fast MediaTek G85 Octa-Core Processor. Paired with a whopping 4 GB of RAM and a vast 128 GB of UFS 2.2 storage, the Redmi 13C transforms every task into a breeze. Say goodbye to lag and hello to efficiency as you navigate through applications, games, and multimedia effortlessly. Fuel your day with the robust 5000 mAh Battery of the Redmi 13C. Whether you're a power user or a casual smartphone enthusiast, this device keeps up with your pace. Bid farewell to battery anxiety, and embrace the freedom to go through your day without worrying about running out of charge. The 18 W fast charging capability ensures a quick boost whenever needed. Life is unpredictable, but your smartphone doesn't have to be. The Redmi 13C stands tall against everyday wear and tear, thanks to the robust Corning Gorilla Glass protecting its display. With splash and dust resistance, this phone becomes your reliable companion in any environment – be it a bustling city or an adventurous outdoor escapade. Security meets convenience with the Quick Unlock Fingerprint scanner of the Redmi 13C. Your smartphone is not just a device; it's an extension of yourself, secured by the unique imprint of your fingerprint. Access your world swiftly and securely, knowing that your privacy is in safe hands.
Review: Vary vary good

Description: T3x 5G is equipped with the Snapdragon 6 Gen 1 - 4 nm 5G mobile platform and features a 8-core CPU architecture. The next-gen 4 nm platform boasts a benchmark score of approximately 560K+, offering the most powerful performance in its price range and providing ultra-smooth gaming and multitasking. The ultra-long lasting 6000 mAh battery life offers you a non-stop immersive experience whether you're gaming, binge-watching, or listening to music without worrying about the battery running out. The 300% volume and Audio Booster, combined with a Dual Stereo Speaker, bring you a highly impactful cinematic auditory feast. The sound quality is finer and clearer for a more dimensional and robust effect. Immerse yourself in the atmosphere and emotions and experience even the most nuanced movements and emotional shifts of each character in films. T3x features a 120 Hz FHD+ high-brightness punch-hole display. A large display delivers a cinematic and immersive experience. Smooth playback, a wide field of view, rich, vivid, and high-contrast colors, as well as clear light and dark details, jointly bring you an immersive viewing experience. Exquisite and high-end dial design: The camera adopts an exquisite and sophisticated "premium dial" design. Paired with precision gears, the eye-catching design showcases fine lines and high-precision craftsmanship. Enhanced system performance and seamless multitasking eliminate the need to manually quit apps running in the background. 8 GB Extended RAM for the 8 GB RAM edition increases the number of active background apps. Smoother switching between apps, instant running of background apps. Equipped with a 50 MP main camera, the device captures even more details. Whether it's bright or dark, trust our outstanding image processing to deliver ultra-sharp images full of intricacies. Clearer Images in Low Light, Your Exclusive Night Photography Partner. The Video mode for the rear camera supports recording 4K videos. It allows you to easily take sharper videos, making you the director of your own life. Super Night Algorithms are optimized for the rear camera using noise cancellation and frame merging algorithms, empowering you to capture every wonderful nighttime moment with purer and more expressive images. IP64 Dust and Water Resistance for a More Reliable Experience. Capable of withstanding pure water being splashed, sprayed, or directly poured onto it. This phone is built to withstand the elements, keeping your adventures worry-free.
Review: Display- not too good. Processor- greatCamera(front) -badCamera(back) -decentBattery- impressive.

Description: T3x 5G is equipped with the Snapdragon 6 Gen 1 - 4 nm 5G mobile platform and features a 8-core CPU architecture. The next-gen 4 nm platform boasts a benchmark score of approximately 560K+, offering the most powerful performance in its price range and providing ultra-smooth gaming and multitasking. The ultra-long lasting 6000 mAh battery life offers you a non-stop immersive experience whether you're gaming, binge-watching, or listening to music without worrying about the battery running out. The 300% volume and Audio Booster, combined with a Dual Stereo Speaker, bring you a highly impactful cinematic auditory feast. The sound quality is finer and clearer for a more dimensional and robust effect. Immerse yourself in the atmosphere and emotions and experience even the most nuanced movements and emotional shifts of each character in films. T3x features a 120 Hz FHD+ high-brightness punch-hole display. A large display delivers a cinematic and immersive experience. Smooth playback, a wide field of view, rich, vivid, and high-contrast colors, as well as clear light and dark details, jointly bring you an immersive viewing experience. Exquisite and high-end dial design: The camera adopts an exquisite and sophisticated "premium dial" design. Paired with precision gears, the eye-catching design showcases fine lines and high-precision craftsmanship. Enhanced system performance and seamless multitasking eliminate the need to manually quit apps running in the background. 8 GB Extended RAM for the 8 GB RAM edition increases the number of active background apps. Smoother switching between apps, instant running of background apps. Equipped with a 50 MP main camera, the device captures even more details. Whether it's bright or dark, trust our outstanding image processing to deliver ultra-sharp images full of intricacies. Clearer Images in Low Light, Your Exclusive Night Photography Partner. The Video mode for the rear camera supports recording 4K videos. It allows you to easily take sharper videos, making you the director of your own life. Super Night Algorithms are optimized for the rear camera using noise cancellation and frame merging algorithms, empowering you to capture every wonderful nighttime moment with purer and more expressive images. IP64 Dust and Water Resistance for a More Reliable Experience. Capable of withstanding pure water being splashed, sprayed, or directly poured onto it. This phone is built to withstand the elements, keeping your adventures worry-free.
Review: Nice phone at this price point this phone is all rounder It has nice display Camera is also nice I have added some samplesPerformance is also nice no lagUi is also good But it doesn't has 4k video recording as mentioned  You can blindly go for this phone ✨
