Enrich your entertainment experience and make it larger than life with the 17.22 cm (6.7) pOLED curved display. Immerse yourself in more than a billion shades of true-to-life colours and a display that truly represents natural skin tones that are Validated by Pantone. HDR10+ support along with a 100% DCI-P3 colour gamut gives you a cinematic experience that offers incredible contrast, vibrant picture quality and sharper details. The ultra-smooth 144 Hz refresh rate enables you to switch between apps, play games, and scroll seamlessly. Transform every moment into a cherished memory with the 50 MP main OIS camera that comes with the widest aperture (f/1.4) available in the segment, so you get a better low-light performance and natural soft-focus backgrounds. Whether you’re capturing a beautiful shot or creating content, shoot with confidence as you experience the full spectrum of real-world colours and accurate skin tones that are validated by Pantone. Additionally, make the most of all the AI-fueled features like Tilt Shot, AI Photo Enhancement, EngineFusion, Advanced Long Exposure, AI Adaptive Stabilization, and more to take your creativity to the next level. Capture all the emotions with motion, no matter how much you or your subject move around. Take advantage of our most advanced stabilization and auto-focus ever to unleash your creativity with the new AI-enabled features that make it easy to get great results on the move. Adaptive Stabilization uses AI to recognize your movement while filming and dynamically adjusts the stabilization level for the best results. Auto Focus Tracking gives you sharp, clear results by using AI to keep your subject in focus, always. Enhance your image quality and shoot like a pro with AI-enhanced image Processing. AI improves the dynamic range and enables both software-based bokeh and advanced noise reduction, especially in low-lighting conditions. All this processing happens on uncompressed RAW image data as it simultaneously applies settings from multiple shooting modes into one to deliver peak quality and finer details. You can really notice the difference when you zoom in. Zoom into your subject and see the scene clearly from 3X the distance with Optical Zoom, or use advanced Hybrid Zoom for 30X the distance. Either way, Optical Image Stabilization smoothens out unwanted shakes, so your photos turn out crystal clear. Experience amazing detail thanks to the dedicated Telephoto Lens, which captures professional portraits too, which means that more of your subject can be in the frame. Snap stunning selfies with the 50 MP selfie camera, one of the highest-resolution front cameras in its class. Plus, your entire gang will be the frame and will stay in focus no matter how far they are from the camera thanks to the Auto Focus technology. Also enjoy 4X better low-light sensitivity with Quad Pixel technology, which combines every four pixels into one for brilliant results. All-in-all, get great results even in dark environments with an f/1.9 aperture that’s wider than most selfie cameras. Submerge all your worries underwater with Motorola Edge 50 Pro which comes with an IP68 rating. This means you get underwater protection as you go with the flow and everyday peace of mind. The phone can also withstand dust, dirt, and sand, along with submersion in 1.5 meters of water for up to 30 minutes. Power-up possibilities with 125 W, the fastest TurboPower charging ever. The blazing-fast TurboPower 50 W wireless charging lets you refuel your phone without the hassle of any cords and cables. Wait, there’s more, you can even help out a friend in need and give them a little battery life with the 10 W wireless reverse charging. Customize your moto and make it your own by choosing fonts, colours, unique wallpapers, icons, and widgets that match your vibe. You can also make your Moto more intuitive, more personal and more secure with exclusive Moto features. Moto Secure protects your phone and keeps all the threats at bay. It’s your go-to destination for all your key security and privacy features. Moto Connect gives you more space to work and play. Play mobile games on your TV, feel like you’re in the room during video calls and use your favourite apps on your desktop. Family Space allows you to set limits on screen time, control access to apps, and create multiple profiles on your phone where kids can explore, learn and play freely. Say hello to a smartphone that truly reflects your unique style. Generate personalized wallpapers and device themes tailored to your taste with the Motorola Edge 50 Pro. Simply snap a pic of your outfit or any funky pattern and witness the AI Generative technology create four exclusive images that match your vibe. Select your favourite and set it as your wallpaper, so your smartphone and you are always in perfect sync. Imagine a device that empowers you to confidently capture and view the true essence of your surroundings as you see them. Experience more than a billion real-world colours and a wide spectrum of human skin tones with Motorola Edge 50 Pro, the smartphone with a Pantone-validated camera and display.
Review: 1.Phone is light weight2.Display is good3.As per 3 days of usage battery backup is good4.No issues with call quality5.Phone do heat up little bit but manageable6.Camera quality is good7.With 68 W charger phone charges quick8.If you had used a bigger display phone earlier, then you may take few days to adjust as the display width is less compared to other phones which has the similar display size. Also curve display will take some time to get used to.Over all phone is very good, looks...

Description: Thoughtfully designed with a sense of harmony, the premium curves flow through every element of the Motorola Edge 50 Pro, with a precision-cut metal frame and symmetrical curved edges that fit the natural contours of your hand like a glove. Stand out from the crowd with the silicone vegan leather finish that feels rich, smooth, and natural to the touch. You can also flaunt the tofu colour variant that boasts a beautiful pearl finish which has been handcrafted in Italy. Enrich your entertainment experience and make it larger than life with the 17.22 cm (6.7) pOLED curved display. Immerse yourself in more than a billion shades of true-to-life colours and a display that truly represents natural skin tones that are Validated by Pantone. HDR10+ support along with a 100% DCI-P3 colour gamut gives you a cinematic experience that offers incredible contrast, vibrant picture quality and sharper details. The ultra-smooth 144 Hz refresh rate enables you to switch between apps, play games, and scroll seamlessly. Transform every moment into a cherished memory with the 50 MP main OIS camera that comes with the widest aperture (f/1.4) available in the segment, so you get a better low-light performance and natural soft-focus backgrounds. Whether you’re capturing a beautiful shot or creating content, shoot with confidence as you experience the full spectrum of real-world colours and accurate skin tones that are validated by Pantone. Additionally, make the most of all the AI-fueled features like Tilt Shot, AI Photo Enhancement, EngineFusion, Advanced Long Exposure, AI Adaptive Stabilization, and more to take your creativity to the next level. Capture all the emotions with motion, no matter how much you or your subject move around. Take advantage of our most advanced stabilization and auto-focus ever to unleash your creativity with the new AI-enabled features that make it easy to get great results on the move. Adaptive Stabilization uses AI to recognize your movement while filming and dynamically adjusts the stabilization level for the best results. Auto Focus Tracking gives you sharp, clear results by using AI to keep your subject in focus, always. Enhance your image quality and shoot like a pro with AI-enhanced image Processing. AI improves the dynamic range and enables both software-based bokeh and advanced noise reduction, especially in low-lighting conditions. All this processing happens on uncompressed RAW image data as it simultaneously applies settings from multiple shooting modes into one to deliver peak quality and finer details. You can really notice the difference when you zoom in. Zoom into your subject and see the scene clearly from 3X the distance with Optical Zoom, or use advanced Hybrid Zoom for 30X the distance. Either way, Optical Image Stabilization smoothens out unwanted shakes, so your photos turn out crystal clear. Experience amazing detail thanks to the dedicated Telephoto Lens, which captures professional portraits too, which means that more of your subject can be in the frame. Snap stunning selfies with the 50 MP selfie camera, one of the highest-resolution front cameras in its class. Plus, your entire gang will be the frame and will stay in focus no matter how far they are from the camera thanks to the Auto Focus technology. Also enjoy 4X better low-light sensitivity with Quad Pixel technology, which combines every four pixels into one for brilliant results. All-in-all, get great results even in dark environments with an f/1.9 aperture that’s wider than most selfie cameras. Submerge all your worries underwater with Motorola Edge 50 Pro which comes with an IP68 rating. This means you get underwater protection as you go with the flow and everyday peace of mind. The phone can also withstand dust, dirt, and sand, along with submersion in 1.5 meters of water for up to 30 minutes. Power-up possibilities with 125 W, the fastest TurboPower charging ever. The blazing-fast TurboPower 50 W wireless charging lets you refuel your phone without the hassle of any cords and cables. Wait, there’s more, you can even help out a friend in need and give them a little battery life with the 10 W wireless reverse charging. Customize your moto and make it your own by choosing fonts, colours, unique wallpapers, icons, and widgets that match your vibe. You can also make your Moto more intuitive, more personal and more secure with exclusive Moto features. Moto Secure protects your phone and keeps all the threats at bay. It’s your go-to destination for all your key security and privacy features. Moto Connect gives you more space to work and play. Play mobile games on your TV, feel like you’re in the room during video calls and use your favourite apps on your desktop. Family Space allows you to set limits on screen time, control access to apps, and create multiple profiles on your phone where kids can explore, learn and play freely. Say hello to a smartphone that truly reflects your unique style. Generate personalized wallpapers and device themes tailored to your taste with the Motorola Edge 50 Pro. Simply snap a pic of your outfit or any funky pattern and witness the AI Generative technology create four exclusive images that match your vibe. Select your favourite and set it as your wallpaper, so your smartphone and you are always in perfect sync. Imagine a device that empowers you to confidently capture and view the true essence of your surroundings as you see them. Experience more than a billion real-world colours and a wide spectrum of human skin tones with Motorola Edge 50 Pro, the smartphone with a Pantone-validated camera and display.
Review: Super mobile Paisa vasool and best colour moonlight pearl like ice cube 😍

Description: The POCO C65 smartphone comes with a large display and a fast 90 Hz refresh rate to deliver exceptional visuals. You can see all the visuals come to life on this smartphone’s large display. It is perfect if you like to engage in games, or watch movies. Thanks to the MediaTek Helio G85 processor featured in this smartphone. With an Antutu score of over 280K, this smartphone ensures to deliver superior performance. The GPU of this processor is capable of delivering up to 1 GHz clock speed to enhance the power of this processor. This smartphone is built to offer exceptional performance with its Turbo RAM feature. You can easily switch between apps without facing any lag and multitask more efficiently. With up to 12 GB of RAM, this smartphone allows you to enjoy your day-to-day activities. The elevated storage capacity of this smartphone is what makes it unique. You can store all your documents, photos, and videos in it to cherish the beautiful memories of life. It comes with a storage space of 128 GB of ROM which can be expanded to up to another 8 GB for enhanced space. Courtesy of the 50 MP triple camera along with a 2 MP macro lens of this smartphone allows you to take stunning photos. You can capture beautiful scenery, portraits, and much more with this smartphone’s camera. The POCO C65 smartphone is equipped with a powerful battery of 5000 mAh which can last more than a day. It supports 18 W fast charging with Type-C cable. You can play games, watch movies, call a friend, and still have a battery left to take you through the day. This smartphone offers enhanced security to your data to keep your phone away from intruders. The side fingerprint sensor delivers security to your phone and all the data stored in it, you can keep your privacy secured with this smartphone.
Review: Looking like so nice value for money good battery backup

Description: Unleash the ultimate performance with the MediaTek Dimensity 7025 octa-core processor. The powerful octa-core processor offers an unbelievably smooth experience while gaming, multi-tasking, or consuming content. MediaTek Dimensity 7025 is based on 2.5GHz frequencies that bring you Superfast 5G performance, an unparalleled camera experience, efficient video processing, and superior gaming capabilities. Its advanced 5G technology ensures faster downloads and better power efficiency, making it the perfect choice for those who demand the best. The moto g64 5G, powered by a leading 6000mAh battery, promises endless entertainment on the go. Dive into the fastest 5G world without the fear of running out of power. Its robust 6000mAh battery supports all-day use to work and play as much as you want without worrying about running out of juice. This battery is designed to last you all day today and well into tomorrow. With TurboPower 33W charger, you can get hours of power in just minutes, so you can recharge your phone quickly and easily. Experience smooth performance with the 12 GB RAM + 256 GB storage smartphone. Effortlessly navigate through your apps on the moto g64 5G that's powered by an impressive in-built 12 GB of memory. Say goodbye to storage woes because, with 256 GB internal storage, you have ample space for photos, movies, songs, apps, and games. Thus, this phone enables smooth multitasking and provides ample space for all your multimedia content with LPDDR4X memory type and UFS 2.2 storage. Whether it's gaming, binge-watching, expansive playlists, essential apps, or capturing moments the moto g64 5G can handle it all effortlessly. And if you need more space, you can expand the storage further with a microSD card of up to 1 TB. Capture the beauty of the world with the advanced Shake Free 50MP camera, equipped with OIS for ultra-stable pictures and videos, accompanied by Quad Pixel technology for stunning low-light photos and incredibly smooth videos. This camera offers three different experiences in one advanced 8MP autofocus camera that combines ultra-wide shots, brilliant close-ups, and depth sensors. The OIS compensates for any unwanted camera movements, ensuring clarity even in low light, while the 50MP sensor and Quad Pixel technology provide 4x better low-light sensitivity for sharper and more vibrant photos day or night. With the 16MP selfie camera, capture Insta-worthy content for you. Experience the power of 5G like never before with our phone's impressive 14 5G Bands, boasting 4x4 MIMO and improved 3 carrier aggregation. Unleash your favorite content and activities at unprecedented 5G speeds, ensuring seamless connectivity and extraordinary performance. Immerse yourself in unparalleled visual excellence with a dynamic 120 Hz, 16.51 cm (6.5) Full HD+ IPS LCD display. Experience smoothness and fluidity with an impressive 120Hz refresh rate and 240Hz touch sampling. This ensures that every tap, swipe, and scroll is incredibly responsive and displayed in high definition with unparalleled fluidity, whether you're transitioning between apps, gaming, or browsing the web, your favourite content will come to life like never before. The moto g64 5G is a phone that's designed to stand out and make a statement with its sleek look and delightful tactile feel. Its streamlined aluminium camera housing comes with an Acrylic Glass finish (3D Premium PMMA). It's thin (8.89 mm) and lightweight (192 g), making it one of the lightest phones with a 6000mAh battery. Step into a world of extraordinary sound quality. Treat your ears to premium audio output with Dolby Atmos Dual Stereo Speakers and Moto Spatial Sound technologies. Feel the depth of enhanced bass, the clarity of vocals, and the immersive spatial effects, even at maximum volume. Whether you're using headphones or not, experience a sense of depth, spaciousness, and crystal-clear sound that's tailored just for you. Customize your smartphone with your personal touch with the Latest Android 14 out of the box. Change the colour schemes, themes, and languages of your apps and get complete control over which apps can access your data. Additionally, you will receive guaranteed Android15 operating system updates and 3 years of security updates. Stay ahead with privacy updates that boost your health, safety, and data security, along with expanded accessibility features. The moto g64 5G offers exceptional protection from raindrops, splashes, and spills. Designed to ensure your journey remains uninterrupted, the moto g64 5G stands ready to accompany you through any adventure. Whether you're jogging through the park or engaged in an important call amidst a drizzle, our IP52 water-repellent design gives you the confidence to navigate any situation worry-free.
Review: Using the phone since 2 weeks. Previously using Samsung S21FEPros :1. Very good battery life - goes 1.5 days with approximately 8-9 hrs SOT. Will go 2 days if your SOT is below 4. For me it has been alternating 2 days to 1.5 days.2. Audio - Audio from headphone jack and usb-c both is very good. Speakers are not so good,lacks bass and is not rich.3. Clean Software - At the start you have bloatwares installed which can be completely uninstalled.Good moto features like secure folder and ...

Description: Unleash the ultimate performance with the MediaTek Dimensity 7025 octa-core processor. The powerful octa-core processor offers an unbelievably smooth experience while gaming, multi-tasking, or consuming content. MediaTek Dimensity 7025 is based on 2.5GHz frequencies that bring you Superfast 5G performance, an unparalleled camera experience, efficient video processing, and superior gaming capabilities. Its advanced 5G technology ensures faster downloads and better power efficiency, making it the perfect choice for those who demand the best. The moto g64 5G, powered by a leading 6000mAh battery, promises endless entertainment on the go. Dive into the fastest 5G world without the fear of running out of power. Its robust 6000mAh battery supports all-day use to work and play as much as you want without worrying about running out of juice. This battery is designed to last you all day today and well into tomorrow. With TurboPower 33W charger, you can get hours of power in just minutes, so you can recharge your phone quickly and easily. Experience smooth performance with the 12 GB RAM + 256 GB storage smartphone. Effortlessly navigate through your apps on the moto g64 5G that's powered by an impressive in-built 12 GB of memory. Say goodbye to storage woes because, with 256 GB internal storage, you have ample space for photos, movies, songs, apps, and games. Thus, this phone enables smooth multitasking and provides ample space for all your multimedia content with LPDDR4X memory type and UFS 2.2 storage. Whether it's gaming, binge-watching, expansive playlists, essential apps, or capturing moments the moto g64 5G can handle it all effortlessly. And if you need more space, you can expand the storage further with a microSD card of up to 1 TB. Capture the beauty of the world with the advanced Shake Free 50MP camera, equipped with OIS for ultra-stable pictures and videos, accompanied by Quad Pixel technology for stunning low-light photos and incredibly smooth videos. This camera offers three different experiences in one advanced 8MP autofocus camera that combines ultra-wide shots, brilliant close-ups, and depth sensors. The OIS compensates for any unwanted camera movements, ensuring clarity even in low light, while the 50MP sensor and Quad Pixel technology provide 4x better low-light sensitivity for sharper and more vibrant photos day or night. With the 16MP selfie camera, capture Insta-worthy content for you. Experience the power of 5G like never before with our phone's impressive 14 5G Bands, boasting 4x4 MIMO and improved 3 carrier aggregation. Unleash your favorite content and activities at unprecedented 5G speeds, ensuring seamless connectivity and extraordinary performance. Immerse yourself in unparalleled visual excellence with a dynamic 120 Hz, 16.51 cm (6.5) Full HD+ IPS LCD display. Experience smoothness and fluidity with an impressive 120Hz refresh rate and 240Hz touch sampling. This ensures that every tap, swipe, and scroll is incredibly responsive and displayed in high definition with unparalleled fluidity, whether you're transitioning between apps, gaming, or browsing the web, your favourite content will come to life like never before. The moto g64 5G is a phone that's designed to stand out and make a statement with its sleek look and delightful tactile feel. Its streamlined aluminium camera housing comes with an Acrylic Glass finish (3D Premium PMMA). It's thin (8.89 mm) and lightweight (192 g), making it one of the lightest phones with a 6000mAh battery. Step into a world of extraordinary sound quality. Treat your ears to premium audio output with Dolby Atmos Dual Stereo Speakers and Moto Spatial Sound technologies. Feel the depth of enhanced bass, the clarity of vocals, and the immersive spatial effects, even at maximum volume. Whether you're using headphones or not, experience a sense of depth, spaciousness, and crystal-clear sound that's tailored just for you. Customize your smartphone with your personal touch with the Latest Android 14 out of the box. Change the colour schemes, themes, and languages of your apps and get complete control over which apps can access your data. Additionally, you will receive guaranteed Android15 operating system updates and 3 years of security updates. Stay ahead with privacy updates that boost your health, safety, and data security, along with expanded accessibility features. The moto g64 5G offers exceptional protection from raindrops, splashes, and spills. Designed to ensure your journey remains uninterrupted, the moto g64 5G stands ready to accompany you through any adventure. Whether you're jogging through the park or engaged in an important call amidst a drizzle, our IP52 water-repellent design gives you the confidence to navigate any situation worry-free.
Review: The phone was good, but the battery drained faster than other mobiles.charging slowly, screen casting not working and over heating problem.

Description: This laptop has sleek design and is lightweight so that you can carry it anywhere. It has a long-lasting battery of 75 Wh that lasts about 22 hours on a single charge. It also features fast charging and can charge your system up to 60% in about 49 minutes. This laptop features an AMD Ryzen 7000 U series processor with a fast 4266 MHz LDDR4X RAM for fast processing. It has an AMD Radeon graphics card so that you can enjoy immersive gaming sessions. It also has four PCIe 3.0 SSDs to fulfill all your storage needs. The Asus Zenbook 14 OLED laptop features fast connectivity with WiFi 6E and Asus WiFi Master Premium Technology so that you can always stay connected to the world. Enjoy an immersive display on the 16:10 2.8 K OLED NanoEdge touchscreen. It also has a thin bezel with a screen-to-body ratio of 90% that makes it compact, easy to view, and use. This laptop is the perfect choice for designers and artists as it features motion clarity and colour accuracy that enhance your creativity. The OLED display suppresses the blue light emitted from the laptop by up to 70% and protects your eyes, allowing you to work for long hours on the Asus Zenbook 14 OLED laptop. Thanks to the Dolby Atmos stereo system featured in this laptop that lets you enjoy your favourite songs in HD quality. This laptop features an Asus ErgoSense keyboard and touchpad that enables you to use the keypad with ease and comfort. The ErgoSense keyboard has optimum key bounce and gives accurate clicks that makes your work easy and quick. The Asus Zenbook 14 OLED laptop is designed to make your life easy. With the F9 key you can control the mic and F10 lets you control the webcam shield. It has a fingerprint scanner for maximum security. Its unique touchpad features the Asus NumberPad 2.0 numeric keypad that makes computing easy. Thanks to the Asus 3D Noise Reduction Technology (3DNR) and Intelligent Collaboration software featured in this laptop you can have crystal-clear video calls. The 3DNR enhances the video quality by reducing background noise so that you can enjoy unlimited video calls. This laptop features multiple ports so that you are always connected wherever you are. It has a USB 3.2 Gen 2 Type-C port for fast charging, data transfers, and much more. It also has an HDMI 2.1 port, USB 3.2 Gen 2 Type-A port, a microSD card reader, and an audio combo jack. This laptop has been tested by MIL-STD-810H U.S. for reliability and durability ensuring that it can withstand damages from falling, extreme temperatures, and much more. Enjoy sharing data and view videos and images together with your peers with the 180-degree lay-flat hinge featured in this laptop.
Review: Bought it on launch sale at 65k. At its price, it's simply unmatched. The built, and screen and sound are top notch. 75w battery easily goes for 8-9+ hrs. One issue is heating, the laptop heats a lot, But I am very confident it will get solved in updates. My friend hp envy too have oled at fhd but this 2880p display is much better.There is no major flaw and holding it makes you feel really happy.Pros--Awesome display-Fantastic battery-Great build and sleek-Very good Speakers-Backlit ...

Description: This laptop has sleek design and is lightweight so that you can carry it anywhere. It has a long-lasting battery of 75 Wh that lasts about 22 hours on a single charge. It also features fast charging and can charge your system up to 60% in about 49 minutes. This laptop features an AMD Ryzen 7000 U series processor with a fast 4266 MHz LDDR4X RAM for fast processing. It has an AMD Radeon graphics card so that you can enjoy immersive gaming sessions. It also has four PCIe 3.0 SSDs to fulfill all your storage needs. The Asus Zenbook 14 OLED laptop features fast connectivity with WiFi 6E and Asus WiFi Master Premium Technology so that you can always stay connected to the world. Enjoy an immersive display on the 16:10 2.8 K OLED NanoEdge touchscreen. It also has a thin bezel with a screen-to-body ratio of 90% that makes it compact, easy to view, and use. This laptop is the perfect choice for designers and artists as it features motion clarity and colour accuracy that enhance your creativity. The OLED display suppresses the blue light emitted from the laptop by up to 70% and protects your eyes, allowing you to work for long hours on the Asus Zenbook 14 OLED laptop. Thanks to the Dolby Atmos stereo system featured in this laptop that lets you enjoy your favourite songs in HD quality. This laptop features an Asus ErgoSense keyboard and touchpad that enables you to use the keypad with ease and comfort. The ErgoSense keyboard has optimum key bounce and gives accurate clicks that makes your work easy and quick. The Asus Zenbook 14 OLED laptop is designed to make your life easy. With the F9 key you can control the mic and F10 lets you control the webcam shield. It has a fingerprint scanner for maximum security. Its unique touchpad features the Asus NumberPad 2.0 numeric keypad that makes computing easy. Thanks to the Asus 3D Noise Reduction Technology (3DNR) and Intelligent Collaboration software featured in this laptop you can have crystal-clear video calls. The 3DNR enhances the video quality by reducing background noise so that you can enjoy unlimited video calls. This laptop features multiple ports so that you are always connected wherever you are. It has a USB 3.2 Gen 2 Type-C port for fast charging, data transfers, and much more. It also has an HDMI 2.1 port, USB 3.2 Gen 2 Type-A port, a microSD card reader, and an audio combo jack. This laptop has been tested by MIL-STD-810H U.S. for reliability and durability ensuring that it can withstand damages from falling, extreme temperatures, and much more. Enjoy sharing data and view videos and images together with your peers with the 180-degree lay-flat hinge featured in this laptop.
Review: Very happy with the purchase, the display is top notch and performance and battery life of ryzen is amazing, the speakers could have some improvement but overall its amazing.

Description: Thanks to the Intel Core processor and Intel Iris Graphics card, you can enjoy an immersive gaming experience on this Acer laptop. It comes with a RAM of 8 GB and can be expandable up to 32 GB so that you have enough space to store all your applications. This laptop has a sleek and stylish design and weighs around 1.49 kg which makes it easy to carry it wherever you wish to. It also has a long-lasting battery life so that you do not have to charge often and travel worry-free. This laptop features about 512 GB of M.2 PCIe SSD so that you can easily store all your data like work files, media, and much more. You can instantly connect to the world outside, thanks to the WiFi 6 featured in this laptop. The HD camera and dual microphones enhance your video calling quality so that you can stay connected with your friends and family. This laptop comes with a wider range of ports like two USB 3.2 Gen 1 Type-A ports, one USB 3.2 Type-C port, and an HDMI port so that you can always stay connected wherever you are.
Review: pros:  - build quality is good considering price - display is also good (fhd ips panel) - overall good package - performance is good, gta v with 1080p low gives avg 32 fps. 720p low gives 45fps - type-c port is fully functional, you can connect external display with power delivery!! - battery is decent, will easily give 4+ hrs in normal usecons:  - display has backlit bleed issue, only visible in full black output - wifi is pathetic, speed is 4x less, if you get 40mbps in mobile the...

Description: Thanks to the Intel Core processor and Intel Iris Graphics card, you can enjoy an immersive gaming experience on this Acer laptop. It comes with a RAM of 8 GB and can be expandable up to 32 GB so that you have enough space to store all your applications. This laptop has a sleek and stylish design and weighs around 1.49 kg which makes it easy to carry it wherever you wish to. It also has a long-lasting battery life so that you do not have to charge often and travel worry-free. This laptop features about 512 GB of M.2 PCIe SSD so that you can easily store all your data like work files, media, and much more. You can instantly connect to the world outside, thanks to the WiFi 6 featured in this laptop. The HD camera and dual microphones enhance your video calling quality so that you can stay connected with your friends and family. This laptop comes with a wider range of ports like two USB 3.2 Gen 1 Type-A ports, one USB 3.2 Type-C port, and an HDMI port so that you can always stay connected wherever you are.

Description: As the DELL Inspiron 3520 laptop boasts a stylish and portable design, it is an ideal choice for users who prioritise both aesthetics and convenience. With its sleek profile and lightweight build, it offers effortless portability, allowing users to carry it comfortably wherever they go. Whether you're commuting to work, attending classes, or working from home, this laptop's design ensures you can do so with ease and style. Sporting a 39.624 cm (15.6) Full HD WVA AG Anti-Glare display, this laptop delivers impressive visual clarity and smooth performance. The anti-glare feature reduces reflections, making it suitable for use in various lighting conditions without causing eye strain. Whether you're watching movies, editing photos, or browsing the web, the vibrant display enhances your viewing experience. Boasting a lightweight construction, this laptop is designed for maximum portability and comfort. It does not include an optical disk drive, contributing to its slim and streamlined design. This makes it easy to slip into a bag or backpack without adding unnecessary bulk, ensuring convenience for users on the move. Thanks to its powerful processing capabilities with a DDR4 8 GB RAM and Core i3 processor, this laptop excels in multitasking and handling demanding applications. Whether you're running multiple programs simultaneously, streaming videos, or gaming, it delivers reliable performance without slowdowns. It's equipped to handle everyday computing tasks as well as more intensive activities, providing versatility for a wide range of users.
Review: I purchased  this laptop on june 08... Now its june 15 .. it working fine I am purchasing this for coding.. Simple work run smoothlyBut streaming  or gaming it cause little bit heating... Overall  its very good laptop.. After reading so many reviews , i didn't  like to buy this but i give it a try and it works fine... Thank you dell and flipcart ....

Description: Stamp your style on the world with ASUS Vivobook 15, the feature-packed laptop that makes it easy to get things done, anywhere. For demanding workloads, the 12th Gen Intel® Core™ processor is significantly fast. With DDR4 fast memory and PCIe 3.0 speedy SSD storage, there’s plenty of power in reserve when the going gets tough. Two heat pipes provides you the efficient heat transfer with quiet atmosphere and high-performance to keep it cool in all situations. Crystal clear 39.62 cm (15.6) Full HD panel with 1920 x 1080 resolution. Perfect 16:9 aspect ratio for versatile use cases without letterboxing. Give your eyes a treat with Vivobook 15 clear, slim-bezel, immersive 82% screen-to-body ratio NanoEdge display. Compact, slim enough to pop unobtrusively into any backpack and light enough for easy one-handed carrying that’s ready to go with you anywhere. The 180-Degree lay-flat hinge makes it so much easier when you want to share stuff with those around you. The ASUS ErgoSense keyboard are engineered to enable an unrivaled input experience that’s in harmony with how you move, feel and touch. With 99% bacterial inhibition, you can keep your laptop hygienic and prevent thousands of potentially harmful bacteria. One touch fingerprint login with built-in sensor in touchpad area. Shielding you against prying eyes and disturbances with an integrated privacy shield that slides over the webcam for instant privacy. Treat your ears to the SonicMaster sound system in Vivobook 15. With DTS Audio Processing, you can experience enhanced audio through powerful speakers for distortion-free sound and deep bass. ASUS AI Noise-Canceling Technology that employs machine learning in order to isolate unwanted noise from human speech. This technology helps to filter out ambient noise for optimum group conference-call quality. There’s a USB-C 3.2 Gen 1 port, two USB 3.2 Gen 1 Type-A ports, a USB 2.0 port, HDMI output and an audio combo jack — so it’s easy to connect all your existing peripherals, displays and projectors. With up to WiFi 6 fast resolution along with ASUS WiFi Master technology, Vivobook 15 enhances fast and stable connection.

Description: Stamp your style on the world with ASUS Vivobook 15, the feature-packed laptop that makes it easy to get things done, anywhere. For demanding workloads, the 12th Gen Intel® Core™ processor is significantly fast. With DDR4 fast memory and PCIe 3.0 speedy SSD storage, there’s plenty of power in reserve when the going gets tough. Two heat pipes provides you the efficient heat transfer with quiet atmosphere and high-performance to keep it cool in all situations. Crystal clear 39.62 cm (15.6) Full HD panel with 1920 x 1080 resolution. Perfect 16:9 aspect ratio for versatile use cases without letterboxing. Give your eyes a treat with Vivobook 15 clear, slim-bezel, immersive 82% screen-to-body ratio NanoEdge display. Compact, slim enough to pop unobtrusively into any backpack and light enough for easy one-handed carrying that’s ready to go with you anywhere. The 180-Degree lay-flat hinge makes it so much easier when you want to share stuff with those around you. The ASUS ErgoSense keyboard are engineered to enable an unrivaled input experience that’s in harmony with how you move, feel and touch. With 99% bacterial inhibition, you can keep your laptop hygienic and prevent thousands of potentially harmful bacteria. One touch fingerprint login with built-in sensor in touchpad area. Shielding you against prying eyes and disturbances with an integrated privacy shield that slides over the webcam for instant privacy. Treat your ears to the SonicMaster sound system in Vivobook 15. With DTS Audio Processing, you can experience enhanced audio through powerful speakers for distortion-free sound and deep bass. ASUS AI Noise-Canceling Technology that employs machine learning in order to isolate unwanted noise from human speech. This technology helps to filter out ambient noise for optimum group conference-call quality. There’s a USB-C 3.2 Gen 1 port, two USB 3.2 Gen 1 Type-A ports, a USB 2.0 port, HDMI output and an audio combo jack — so it’s easy to connect all your existing peripherals, displays and projectors. With up to WiFi 6 fast resolution along with ASUS WiFi Master technology, Vivobook 15 enhances fast and stable connection.
Review: I've been using it for almost a month. Its very good. Excellent choice for study purposes.

Description: Thanks to its high resolution and elegant display of colours, the HP 15s Laptop gives you an engrossing and true-to-life viewing experience with up to 2 million pixels. Featuring AMD processors and a graphics card, this laptop can help you save time by getting things done quickly even when you're on the go. As a result, you can get your creative juices flowing and get your work done with ease with this laptop. With this laptop, you can easily complete your work, multitask, browse through various applications, compose music, be creative, and do more as it can cater to a variety of your needs while ensuring optimal performance. As this laptop has an inbuilt 4G configuration, it ensures smooth connectivity anytime. Also, wireless connectivity is available through Bluetooth and Wi-Fi on this laptop, so you can connect wherever you are. This laptop's Lithium-ion prismatic battery with up to three cells can smartly adjust depending on the system's needs and other better parameters, thereby ensuring long battery life and exceptional performance. Sporting a lightweight body, this laptop allows you to effortlessly carry it in your hands or bag. This laptop features Alexa so that you can get your work done by simply giving voice commands. With the Alexa Show mode, you can talk to Alexa in full-screen mode and from any location in the room. Additionally, you can create your to-do lists and shopping lists, add reminders, and do more to help you stay organised. Moreover, you can complete other tasks, such as listening to music, staying updated with the latest news, controlling your Smart Home from any corner of your room, etc.
Review: Performing well as i expected since 2021

Description: Stamp your style on the world with ASUS Vivobook 15, the feature-packed laptop that makes it easy to get things done, anywhere. For demanding workloads, the 12th Gen Intel® Core™ processor is significantly fast. With DDR4 fast memory and PCIe 3.0 speedy SSD storage, there’s plenty of power in reserve when the going gets tough. Two heat pipes provides you the efficient heat transfer with quiet atmosphere and high-performance to keep it cool in all situations. Crystal clear 39.62 cm (15.6) Full HD panel with 1920 x 1080 resolution. Perfect 16:9 aspect ratio for versatile use cases without letterboxing. Give your eyes a treat with Vivobook 15 clear, slim-bezel, immersive 82% screen-to-body ratio NanoEdge display. Compact, slim enough to pop unobtrusively into any backpack and light enough for easy one-handed carrying that’s ready to go with you anywhere. The 180-Degree lay-flat hinge makes it so much easier when you want to share stuff with those around you. The ASUS ErgoSense keyboard are engineered to enable an unrivaled input experience that’s in harmony with how you move, feel and touch. With 99% bacterial inhibition, you can keep your laptop hygienic and prevent thousands of potentially harmful bacteria. One touch fingerprint login with built-in sensor in touchpad area. Shielding you against prying eyes and disturbances with an integrated privacy shield that slides over the webcam for instant privacy. Treat your ears to the SonicMaster sound system in Vivobook 15. With DTS Audio Processing, you can experience enhanced audio through powerful speakers for distortion-free sound and deep bass. ASUS AI Noise-Canceling Technology that employs machine learning in order to isolate unwanted noise from human speech. This technology helps to filter out ambient noise for optimum group conference-call quality. There’s a USB-C 3.2 Gen 1 port, two USB 3.2 Gen 1 Type-A ports, a USB 2.0 port, HDMI output and an audio combo jack — so it’s easy to connect all your existing peripherals, displays and projectors. With up to WiFi 6 fast resolution along with ASUS WiFi Master technology, Vivobook 15 enhances fast and stable connection.
Review: I got it for 29k in BBD and this is stellar at this price range. First impressions : Pros: 1. Great design2. Military grade certification for build 3. Full hd 60hz display4. Good for everyday office and student use (not for gaming)5. Fingerprint sensor included6. Wifi 67. Decent speakersCons : 1. Power button included in the keypad itself. This creates an issue after a few years when you overuse the laptop's keypad and suddenly one of the circuits get broken and you have to replac...

Description: Stamp your style on the world with ASUS Vivobook 15, the feature-packed laptop that makes it easy to get things done, anywhere. For demanding workloads, the 12th Gen Intel® Core™ processor is significantly fast. With DDR4 fast memory and PCIe 3.0 speedy SSD storage, there’s plenty of power in reserve when the going gets tough. Two heat pipes provides you the efficient heat transfer with quiet atmosphere and high-performance to keep it cool in all situations. Crystal clear 39.62 cm (15.6) Full HD panel with 1920 x 1080 resolution. Perfect 16:9 aspect ratio for versatile use cases without letterboxing. Give your eyes a treat with Vivobook 15 clear, slim-bezel, immersive 82% screen-to-body ratio NanoEdge display. Compact, slim enough to pop unobtrusively into any backpack and light enough for easy one-handed carrying that’s ready to go with you anywhere. The 180-Degree lay-flat hinge makes it so much easier when you want to share stuff with those around you. The ASUS ErgoSense keyboard are engineered to enable an unrivaled input experience that’s in harmony with how you move, feel and touch. With 99% bacterial inhibition, you can keep your laptop hygienic and prevent thousands of potentially harmful bacteria. One touch fingerprint login with built-in sensor in touchpad area. Shielding you against prying eyes and disturbances with an integrated privacy shield that slides over the webcam for instant privacy. Treat your ears to the SonicMaster sound system in Vivobook 15. With DTS Audio Processing, you can experience enhanced audio through powerful speakers for distortion-free sound and deep bass. ASUS AI Noise-Canceling Technology that employs machine learning in order to isolate unwanted noise from human speech. This technology helps to filter out ambient noise for optimum group conference-call quality. There’s a USB-C 3.2 Gen 1 port, two USB 3.2 Gen 1 Type-A ports, a USB 2.0 port, HDMI output and an audio combo jack — so it’s easy to connect all your existing peripherals, displays and projectors. With up to WiFi 6 fast resolution along with ASUS WiFi Master technology, Vivobook 15 enhances fast and stable connection.
Review: Excellent value for the price. A plus point is that this laptop offers RAM Expansion Slot and I have already upgraded my RAM from 8GB DDR4 to 16GB DDR4. Performance is amazing thanks to the inclusion of the PCIe NVMe SSD. Boot Up time is less than 15 seconds. And the 6 Core Intel Core i3 1215U also does a fantastic job in the performance department. The fingerprint sensor is a nice addition and it's extremely fast as well. The only thing that I didn't like is the display. Although the display...

Review: 1. The display is good and sharp enough, color accuracy is also good2. The top lid is metal built. The rest is plastic (or maybe fiber). It is solid and sturdy. The best part is it can be opened up to 180 degrees wide.3. The keyboard is tactile and not very loud, which makes it more premium. Though not a backlit one, it's not a big issue.4. The trackpad is large enough that the whole screen can be covered with one swipe (with proper dpi obviously). The fingerprint sensor is also accurate a...

Description: This laptop has sleek design and is lightweight so that you can carry it anywhere. It has a long-lasting battery of 75 Wh that lasts about 22 hours on a single charge. It also features fast charging and can charge your system up to 60% in about 49 minutes. This laptop features an AMD Ryzen 7000 U series processor with a fast 4266 MHz LDDR4X RAM for fast processing. It has an AMD Radeon graphics card so that you can enjoy immersive gaming sessions. It also has four PCIe 3.0 SSDs to fulfill all your storage needs. The Asus Zenbook 14 OLED laptop features fast connectivity with WiFi 6E and Asus WiFi Master Premium Technology so that you can always stay connected to the world. Enjoy an immersive display on the 16:10 2.8 K OLED NanoEdge touchscreen. It also has a thin bezel with a screen-to-body ratio of 90% that makes it compact, easy to view, and use. This laptop is the perfect choice for designers and artists as it features motion clarity and colour accuracy that enhance your creativity. The OLED display suppresses the blue light emitted from the laptop by up to 70% and protects your eyes, allowing you to work for long hours on the Asus Zenbook 14 OLED laptop. Thanks to the Dolby Atmos stereo system featured in this laptop that lets you enjoy your favourite songs in HD quality. This laptop features an Asus ErgoSense keyboard and touchpad that enables you to use the keypad with ease and comfort. The ErgoSense keyboard has optimum key bounce and gives accurate clicks that makes your work easy and quick. The Asus Zenbook 14 OLED laptop is designed to make your life easy. With the F9 key you can control the mic and F10 lets you control the webcam shield. It has a fingerprint scanner for maximum security. Its unique touchpad features the Asus NumberPad 2.0 numeric keypad that makes computing easy. Thanks to the Asus 3D Noise Reduction Technology (3DNR) and Intelligent Collaboration software featured in this laptop you can have crystal-clear video calls. The 3DNR enhances the video quality by reducing background noise so that you can enjoy unlimited video calls. This laptop features multiple ports so that you are always connected wherever you are. It has a USB 3.2 Gen 2 Type-C port for fast charging, data transfers, and much more. It also has an HDMI 2.1 port, USB 3.2 Gen 2 Type-A port, a microSD card reader, and an audio combo jack. This laptop has been tested by MIL-STD-810H U.S. for reliability and durability ensuring that it can withstand damages from falling, extreme temperatures, and much more. Enjoy sharing data and view videos and images together with your peers with the 180-degree lay-flat hinge featured in this laptop.
Review: Does what it says.No second thought; just go for it.

Description: The Vivobook Go 15 laptop's FHD screen creates incredibly vibrant and crisp visuals. Due to the NanoEdge's small bezel design, you also get increased screen real estate, enabling deep viewing and multitasking. The Vivobook Go 15 laptop's AMD Ryzen 7000-U Series processor, 5500 MHz fast LDDR5 memory, and PCIe 3.0 SSD storage can help you carry out all your work tasks. This laptop's quick charging function allows the battery to reach 60% of its capacity in just 49 minutes. This provides you with the endurance you need to get through a demanding day. You can sway to your favourite song thanks to this laptop's ASUS SonicMaster and DTS Audio Processor, which provide astonishingly loud, high-quality sound. The software and technologies also collaborate to improve audio quality for completely breathtaking sound, lower noise, and increase intensity. You can carry this laptop wherever you go and continue to be productive thanks to its svelte form. This laptop sports a carefully made, 180-degree lay-flat hinge that makes it easy to share information and collaborate with others. The ASUS ErgoSense keyboard in this laptop offers a really satisfying experience since the appropriate key bounce and travel are carefully defined. As a consequence, you can type easily on a keyboard that understands your natural typing style. By sliding the built-in privacy cover over the webcam, you can rapidly shield private and sensitive information from prying eyes and interruptions. You can enjoy top-notch privacy and security in this way. The numerous I/O ports on this laptop provide ongoing connectivity and entertainment. Because it contains a USB-C 3.2 Gen 1 connector, a USB 3.2 Gen 1 Type-A port, a USB 2.0 port, an HDMI output, and an audio combo jack, connecting all of your gadgets, displays, and projectors is straightforward. This laptop offers a wide range of wireless networking choices, and the WiFi 6E (802.11ax) technology makes it possible for online content to load incredibly quickly. This laptop is made to be incredibly robust and lasting. Moreover, this laptop is put through a series of tests to ensure it meets the exacting US MIL-STD-810H military-grade standard.

Due to the NanoEdge's small bezel design, you also get increased screen real estate, enabling deep viewing and multitasking. The Vivobook Go 15 laptop's AMD Ryzen 7000-U Series processor, 5500 MHz fast LDDR5 memory, and PCIe 3.0 SSD storage can help you carry out all your work tasks. This laptop's quick charging function allows the battery to reach 60% of its capacity in just 49 minutes. This provides you with the endurance you need to get through a demanding day. You can sway to your favourite song thanks to this laptop's ASUS SonicMaster and DTS Audio Processor, which provide astonishingly loud, high-quality sound. The software and technologies also collaborate to improve audio quality for completely breathtaking sound, lower noise, and increase intensity. You can carry this laptop wherever you go and continue to be productive thanks to its svelte form. This laptop sports a carefully made, 180-degree lay-flat hinge that makes it easy to share information and collaborate with others. The ASUS ErgoSense keyboard in this laptop offers a really satisfying experience since the appropriate key bounce and travel are carefully defined. As a consequence, you can type easily on a keyboard that understands your natural typing style. By sliding the built-in privacy cover over the webcam, you can rapidly shield private and sensitive information from prying eyes and interruptions. You can enjoy top-notch privacy and security in this way. The numerous I/O ports on this laptop provide ongoing connectivity and entertainment. Because it contains a USB-C 3.2 Gen 1 connector, a USB 3.2 Gen 1 Type-A port, a USB 2.0 port, an HDMI output, and an audio combo jack, connecting all of your gadgets, displays, and projectors is straightforward. This laptop offers a wide range of wireless networking choices, and the WiFi 6E (802.11ax) technology makes it possible for online content to load incredibly quickly. This laptop is made to be incredibly robust and lasting. Moreover, this laptop is put through a series of tests to ensure it meets the exacting US MIL-STD-810H military-grade standard.
Review: It's good

This laptop's quick charging function allows the battery to reach 60% of its capacity in just 49 minutes. This provides you with the endurance you need to get through a demanding day. You can carry this laptop wherever you go and continue to be productive thanks to its svelte form. This laptop sports a carefully made, 180-degree lay-flat hinge that makes it easy to share information and collaborate with others. The ASUS ErgoSense keyboard in this laptop offers a really satisfying experience since the appropriate key bounce and travel are carefully defined. As a consequence, you can type easily on a keyboard that understands your natural typing style. By sliding the built-in privacy cover over the webcam, you can rapidly shield private and sensitive information from prying eyes and interruptions. You can enjoy top-notch privacy and security in this way. The numerous I/O ports on this laptop provide ongoing connectivity and entertainment. Because it contains a USB-C 3.2 Gen 1 connector, a USB 3.2 Gen 1 Type-A port, a USB 2.0 port, an HDMI output, and an audio combo jack, connecting all of your gadgets, displays, and projectors is straightforward. This laptop offers a wide range of wireless networking choices, and the WiFi 6E (802.11ax) technology makes it possible for online content to load incredibly quickly. This laptop is made to be incredibly robust and lasting. Moreover, this laptop is put through a series of tests to ensure it meets the exacting US MIL-STD-810H military-grade standard.

Description: Stamp your style on the world with ASUS Vivobook 15, the feature-packed laptop that makes it easy to get things done, anywhere. For demanding workloads, the 12th Gen Intel® Core™ processor is significantly fast. With DDR4 fast memory and PCIe 3.0 speedy SSD storage, there’s plenty of power in reserve when the going gets tough. Two heat pipes provides you the efficient heat transfer with quiet atmosphere and high-performance to keep it cool in all situations. Crystal clear 39.62 cm (15.6) Full HD panel with 1920 x 1080 resolution. Perfect 16:9 aspect ratio for versatile use cases without letterboxing. Give your eyes a treat with Vivobook 15 clear, slim-bezel, immersive 82% screen-to-body ratio NanoEdge display. Compact, slim enough to pop unobtrusively into any backpack and light enough for easy one-handed carrying that’s ready to go with you anywhere. The 180-Degree lay-flat hinge makes it so much easier when you want to share stuff with those around you. The ASUS ErgoSense keyboard are engineered to enable an unrivaled input experience that’s in harmony with how you move, feel and touch. With 99% bacterial inhibition, you can keep your laptop hygienic and prevent thousands of potentially harmful bacteria. One touch fingerprint login with built-in sensor in touchpad area. Shielding you against prying eyes and disturbances with an integrated privacy shield that slides over the webcam for instant privacy. Treat your ears to the SonicMaster sound system in Vivobook 15. With DTS Audio Processing, you can experience enhanced audio through powerful speakers for distortion-free sound and deep bass. ASUS AI Noise-Canceling Technology that employs machine learning in order to isolate unwanted noise from human speech. This technology helps to filter out ambient noise for optimum group conference-call quality. There’s a USB-C 3.2 Gen 1 port, two USB 3.2 Gen 1 Type-A ports, a USB 2.0 port, HDMI output and an audio combo jack — so it’s easy to connect all your existing peripherals, displays and projectors. With up to WiFi 6 fast resolution along with ASUS WiFi Master technology, Vivobook 15 enhances fast and stable connection.
Review: I got it for 29k in BBD and this is stellar at this price range. First impressions : Pros: 1. Great design2. Military grade certification for build 3. Full hd 60hz display4. Good for everyday office and student use (not for gaming)5. Fingerprint sensor included6. Wifi 67. Decent speakersCons : 1. Power button included in the keypad itself. This creates an issue after a few years when you overuse the laptop's keypad and suddenly one of the circuits get broken and you have to replac...

Review: Excellent value for the price. A plus point is that this laptop offers RAM Expansion Slot and I have already upgraded my RAM from 8GB DDR4 to 16GB DDR4. Performance is amazing thanks to the inclusion of the PCIe NVMe SSD. Boot Up time is less than 15 seconds. And the 6 Core Intel Core i3 1215U also does a fantastic job in the performance department. Description: Stamp your style on the world with ASUS Vivobook 15, the feature-packed laptop that makes it easy to get things done, anywhere. For demanding workloads, the 12th Gen Intel® Core™ processor is significantly fast. With DDR4 fast memory and PCIe 3.0 speedy SSD storage, there’s plenty of power in reserve when the going gets tough. Two heat pipes provides you the efficient heat transfer with quiet atmosphere and high-performance to keep it cool in all situations. Crystal clear 39.62 cm (15.6) Full HD panel with 1920 x 1080 resolution. Perfect 16:9 aspect ratio for versatile use cases without letterboxing. Give your eyes a treat with Vivobook 15 clear, slim-bezel, immersive 82% screen-to-body ratio NanoEdge display. Compact, slim enough to pop unobtrusively into any backpack and light enough for easy one-handed carrying that’s ready to go with you anywhere. The 180-Degree lay-flat hinge makes it so much easier when you want to share stuff with those around you. The ASUS ErgoSense keyboard are engineered to enable an unrivaled input experience that’s in harmony with how you move, feel and touch. With 99% bacterial inhibition, you can keep your laptop hygienic and prevent thousands of potentially harmful bacteria. One touch fingerprint login with built-in sensor in touchpad area. Shielding you against prying eyes and disturbances with an integrated privacy shield that slides over the webcam for instant privacy. Treat your ears to the SonicMaster sound system in Vivobook 15. With DTS Audio Processing, you can experience enhanced audio through powerful speakers for distortion-free sound and deep bass. ASUS AI Noise-Canceling Technology that employs machine learning in order to isolate unwanted noise from human speech. This technology helps to filter out ambient noise for optimum group conference-call quality. There’s a USB-C 3.2 Gen 1 port, two USB 3.2 Gen 1 Type-A ports, a USB 2.0 port, HDMI output and an audio combo jack — so it’s easy to connect all your existing peripherals, displays and projectors. With up to WiFi 6 fast resolution along with ASUS WiFi Master technology, Vivobook 15 enhances fast and stable connection.
Review: Good laptop with affordable price,  web camera quality is average.

The best part is it can be opened up to 180 degrees wide.3. The keyboard is tactile and not very loud, which makes it more premium. Though not a backlit one, it's not a big issue.4. The trackpad is large enough that the whole screen can be covered with one swipe (with proper dpi obviously). The fingerprint sensor is also accurate a...

Description: The laptop is designed with a lightweight build, weighing only 1.65 kg, making it easy to carry wherever you go. Its compact dimensions of 359.2 x 235.8 x 19.9 mm add to its portability. This feature is especially useful for those constantly on the move. This way, you can effortlessly carry the device inside of your office bag or backpack when you are hitting the streets. The concise nature of the laptop can also come in handy in keeping your workstation neat and clutter-free. Moreover, the compact design of the gadget also makes it easier for you to keep the laptop safely when it is not in use. Featuring an AMD Ryzen 3 Quad Core 7320U processor with a clock speed ranging from 2.4 GHz to 4.1 GHz, this laptop ensures smooth and efficient performance. It is suitable for processing and multitasking needs, thus proving to be a dependable computing companion. Such advanced processing capabilities can also help with enhancing your overall productivity levels. Equipped with a 512 GB SSD storage, this laptop guarantees faster data access and efficient system performance. The expandable SSD capacity further ensures that storage needs are well accommodated, making it a practical choice for various storage demands. The laptop features a 39.62 cm anti-glare Full HD display with a resolution of 1920 x 1080 pixels. This screen type is designed to provide clear and vivid visuals, whether for work or entertainment purposes. With Wi-Fi 6 (802.11ax 2x2) and Bluetooth v5.1, this laptop offers robust wireless connectivity. Additionally, the HDMI 1.4b port ensures seamless connections to various external displays or devices, making it a versatile tool for various connectivity needs.
Review: Awesome Laptop. Best quality Laptop. Performance is very Nice.liked it From Puri, Odisha. Jay Jagannath.
